column1: my life could be 10x better but nooo...i was in such a suicidal mindset i decided to purposely destroy myself by character assassinating myself and humiliating myself in front of everyone..<e1>it sucks</e1> because <e2>i ruined one of my only chances to get a girlfriend before</e2>. now i'm suffering with all of the things i did and all the burn't bridges. i have it replaying in my head over and over again + during the suicidal mindstate i said "atleast they will feel less bad about my suicide and they don't have to feel  the pain that i comimmited suicide...now i'm just suffering lonely with almost nobody :(.

"people look at me, they tell me i look tired, that i'm way too somber. you can see it in my eyes, when i feel very empty inside i will just sort of stare and my eyes are completely blank and expressionless, i'm aware of what's going on, but honestly i've had this emptiness inside me for so long, ever since i was a child, it doesn't even cross my mind to try to cover it up, pretend that i'm normal and that there's something inside. i just can't anymore. i wish i could be like all these people, that i could just vibe but there's nothing, i'm so empty. i'm so empty and my thoughts are going round and round while i watch all these people hanging out, vibing, enjoying themselves, and i want to be like that too but at the same time i can't anymore. for all these years i tried and i have to try even more. i'm just so empty."

"<e1>ive been friendless for a decade</e1>. <e2>social anxiety is the culprit</e2>. its ruined my life. <e3>im 26 and have no friend to talk to or go out with</e3>. <e4>i feel so depressed about this, today it feels like the world is crushing me</e4>. ive been dealing with this for so long, always living on hope. hope that someday eventually ill meet some people and become friends. theres no opportunities here in my city to meet new people id have to move to a bigger city. and that alone is a really scary thing as im already alone and dont know how to even be independent (live with parents and they do everything for me). <e5>im actually taking some time off work today</e5> because <e6>i cannot work in this state</e6>. i feel horrible and worthless. like how pathetic i have to fantasize about having a life and having fun with friends . i want to be a 26 year old. not just waste my life away working, eating and sleeping and fantasizing and watching tv. (if this isnt the right subreddit to post in let me know where i should post )"

"hey everyone.ive been struggling with pretty severe depression for about 4 years now. certain events occurred recently that made my depression even worse. <e1>i dont see any light at the end of the tunnel</e1>, so <e2>i am pretty much decided that ill be taking my own life soon</e2>, i just have some things i have to settle with family and friends. im curious about those who previously attempted suicide, how did you guys spend your final moments. did you spend it alone, did you spend it with family or friends? and also how did you guys come to grips that you were about to take your own life. did you fear it? did you accept it?"

"so...a bit of context, my mom is on anti-depressant medication but overall there is not a history of mental health issues in my family.  i've always considered myself to be an upbeat, happy, extroverted person and when i'm feeling down a few beers, some weight lifting, a funny video or hanging out with friends is all i need to get myself out of the funk...but... maybe it's not enough right now.  the pandemic has thrown me off, i struggle to sleep; i worry about my social life and my work; i don't seem to be able to ""shut off"" the stress of the day.  i don't think i'm depressed, but sometimes when i'm really down i'll take depression quizzes and it indicates....severe depression.    i thought maybe once i got my second vaccine shot everything would feel normal again, but i don't think it has helped.  i don't feel suicidal, but i constantly feel worn out and lonely in the morning, especially when i wake up in the morning.  am i depressed or is this just some sort of normal mental funk from the pandemic?  what should i do?  i don't feel like i have  mental issue but i'm struggling."

<e1>i recently stopped gaming</e1> because <e2>it made me really sad and depressed</e2>. it went really well for a couple of weeks but i started realizing <e3>why i started</e3>. thats because <e4>im lonely</e4> af now i stoped i realize that i have no friends living nearby. and the ones that do are to busy with their own life.the only thing i want is to feel loved. i would do anything for a cuddle. i spend my day listening to juice wrld waiting for the next day. hes the only thing that keeps me going now a day.

"ive suffered with depression and anxiety since i was 18.  im now 38 and see a dr. and take meds.  i had been doing pretty well until recently.  <e1>i have a 6 month old who doesnt like to sleep at night</e1> and <e2>im just so beaten down</e2>.  i currently stay home with the kids and things get so busy that im lucky if i get at least 1 shower a week.  <e3>my heart just feels so heavy</e3> and <e4>i cry most days</e4>.  today, i was so anxious and upset that i pulled out almost all of my lashes from my right eye.  the worst part is that i dont even know where this depressive state came from.  i was feeling ok until about a week ago.  i take my meds as usual and i just feel miserable.  sometimes i cant help but think that i just want to die but then my kids and husband and my mother would be devastated.  i dont even know what to do to begin to help myself feel better.  sometimes i wish i could just lock myself in the bathroom and plug my ears and just sit in the silence.  lately ive felt like the constant noise from everything at home is too much and i want to hit myself in the face to numb the noise.  normally, i cope with things pretty well but this last week has me so deeply depressed."

"dont get me wrong- i dont think its healthy to stay in a depressed state especially for long. but <e1>what frustrates me</e1> is <e2>when i see family that i havent seen in a while, and people just try to gloss over what im experiencing with fake happiness</e2>. do people ever just listen anymore, and allow others to be vulnerable and honest- without having to sugarcoat everything? life is hard enough, and its even more difficult when we stifle our feelings and pretend theyre not real or relevant."

"so ill keep this short: my best friend is in her early twenties and just arrived at a mental health clinic a few days ago. <e1>no one can visit</e1> because of <e2>covid</e2>, also i am one of very few people who know. we (best friend and i) already texted and exchanged voice messages since shes gone. i plan on checking in on her every few days and i want to send her a little care package, not quite sure what to put in there. she says it helps a little, that i reassure her i will be there for her and that i promised her that i will never look at her differently (shes very ashamed of her problems). <e3>i already have a little experience</e3> because <e4>family members of mine struggled with depression</e4>, but i still would appreciate some advice and tips on what i should and also should not do in order to help her. <e5>not gonna put more info about her in this post</e5>, because <e6>its not my place to tell</e6>, but i am starting to feel overwhelmed by everything shes telling me and just want to make sure that i know what i am doing. i dont want to cause her any more stress, i just want her to know and feel that i am there even when we cant see each other.  any advice?"

"i just spent 8 hours on a roadtrip through the mountains. as i drove i continuously found myself thinking how easy it would be to just go over the edge. i've always thought if i were to end my own life it would be a handful of pills and drive off a mountain road, but i'm definitely not suicidal at this point in my life. but as i thought it while driving i kept going back and forth with myself on whether it was a normal thought or not. i know anxiety on a mountain drive is normal like ""oh, shit, i could go over this mountain"". but these weren't anxious thoughts, they were just calming ""yes, this would be the way"" thoughts. uhm...so normal or i should be concerned? lol"

"<e1>someone said to me that if i kept hiding from the world my pain would have never stopped, they said i should reconcile my soul with the world</e1>. so <e2>i did that</e2> i tried to put myself out there, it didnt end well and augurably it was more painful than keep seething in my loneliness, desperation, hatred and resentment. why the world hates me? what did i do wrong? why my faith keeps being betrayed and my feelings hurt? it's the other people who have wronged me and yet why i feel so guilty? im so mad and sorrowful right now. i hate it out there and i hate inside as well."

"everyday is the same, i find myself waking up miserable, doing nothing all day and counting down the hours until im tired enough to goto sleep just like i would as if i were working a job i hate, except in this case the ""job"" that i hate is life.the only time i get a break from life is while i'm asleep. it's the closest to death that i'm able to come."

"heres the thing. youre already enduring life at its worst and youre guaranteed a death at some point. ive found that the few good days ive had had been enough to push me through the hard ones, and as ive grown and gotten to know my mind a little better, had more empathy for myself, and honestly, stopped thinking about myself and my sadness all the fcking time, things slowly but surely have gotten better. im positive things will get hard again, soon. thats the nature of life. but there are some pretty fun things i want to do eventually, and as much as i hate being alive, its worth making those memories and enjoying those moments. ill die whenever i get old or sick or murdered or whatever my fate is. but i havent been suicidal in almost a year, the first time ive felt this way since 4th grade. just keep living. whether its worth it our not, i cant tell you. thats honestly all subjective. but this life is short and death is inevitable. just wait it out. theres so much that could happen that you cant foresee. im so glad i didnt kill myself the many times i came close to it."

"one moment ill be happy for like 30 seconds then the next moment ill be fucken depressed.....like why? i wish the chemical reactions in my brain could be more stable, im tired of this. i just wanna stop living"

"for last few years <e1>i am always sad</e1>,<e2>i don't have interest in anything but used to like anime a lot but now don't have any motivation at all.  i just want to lie on my bed all the time and just think how bad i m . my college entrance exams are in few days but i haven't prepared at all and nor did i learnt anything in my school as well as i didnt had any desire to do anything. i always thinks how good it would be if i just died and think that suicide would be painful so if i just disappear from existence.  when i get really sad or am about to cry i suddenly gets goosebumps and starts thinking wow how amazing this emotion is and am sometimes think about how interesting my response would be to something much more sad happening like someone close to me dying but then i suddenly think ""what the he'll am i thinking"". i don't know what is wrong with me <e1>but i sometime am happy that i m sad</e1> as <e2>i'm able to feel this emotions then suddenly starts thinking about dying</e2>. am i mad or is it happens with everyone."

"i was never tested by a professional or anything, but i think i may have depression. im 16 and a junior in highschool.i have suicidal thoughts on the daily, and i have written about how and why i would kill myself, i have my own little plan for when i do it aswell. i have already started to write letters to those who impacted me. i am happy though sometimes. but other times i feel terrible, just absolutley horrible. i just want to be alone and isolated and away from everyone and everything. i started to lose interest in the only few things i liked. i have severe adhd. my temper is super short and i get mad at the stupidest things. <e1>i never really thought i had depression up until recently</e1> because <e2>i thought it was normal to have these constant negative thoughts or these changes in emotion</e2>. this was because <e3>i couldnt experience someone elsese mind or how they lived, i also never opened up really</e3>. i was never good at opening up or talking about my emotions. i just hope things get better. i plan to run away soon once i save up money. best option rather than killing myself, i love my parents to much and im afraid killing myself would hurt them."

"my boyfriend and i have been together a year and a half and love each other to pieces, however we have only seen each other face to face once in march last year - in a group setting - and i was a wreck. i was so anxious and wanted to run and hide the whole time, i barely spoke to him. and recently, as my mental health has gotten worse, i find myself struggling to simply message him. <e1>we havent been able to spend time together</e1> due to <e2>covid</e2> and now that things are starting to get back to normal he is wondering about seeing each other in person again,  which is just terrifying to me. i struggle to even get out of bed in the morning and the mere thought of social interaction, especially with someone as important to me as him is so so scary. <e3>i wish things were different and that i wasnt like this</e3>, because <e4>he deserves so much better</e4>. does anyone else feel this way?"

i have been cutting for a while ( i've stopped now) and yesterday i was reaching for something and my mum saw my hand... she started questioning it and she made it such a big fucking deal she called my aunt and cousin. <e1>and by the end of the day my mum was so mad</e1> and <e2>my whole family was mad at me</e2> just cause <e3>they didn't grow up in an environment where they were taught what mental health shit is</e3>. and now my whole family knows that i'm depressed and i officially have no one to talk to.

"my depression is so overwhelming and infuriating. i can be doing fine but one bad experience later and suddenly i cant stand life. for example i like to play games but <e1>when something goes wrong suddenly</e1> <e2>i hate the game</e2> and <e3>start to criticize myself really hard about being a horrible player</e3>. <e4>im afraid to do group stuff</e4> because of <e5>the fear ill cause problems for the other players</e5>. i try to think back to the stuff i learned in my various therapies but all i end up thinking about is that going to therapy/counseling is a waste of time. suddenly i just end up criticizing everything and everyone, especially myself. this has also resulted in me making impulsive decisions that are usually costly in some way (for example deleting a game account that i sunk a lot of money into since its beta years ago and losing items that are no longer accessible).<e6>it sucks completely</e6> because <e7>ive been on 20 different meds and nothing ever worked</e7>. so many therapists and psychiatrists. im left feeling like im going to be a complete mess like this for the rest of my life."

"im literally sobbing. want to know what? a tv character i liked just died. this is the first time ive ever cried over a tv character. death doesnt affect me at all, i could honestly care less. but now here i am sitting on my bed sobbing. if anyone is wondering what character its carl grimes from the walking dead. i had to put my phone down and sit and just cry for 10 minutes. why am i so sensitive all of a sudden?"

"something ive come to notice, is that i tend to be happy whenever i have something to fix my attention on or like: for example kpop, lol as silly as it sounds i used to use kpop content as a way to get away from my issues and dark thoughts. nowadays it tends to be video games, anime, edm, and friends. why is that? does anyone else have specific things they just get obsessed with for no reason, that helps them cope with depression? why does this happen? is it just so we forget abt it? like when i find myself having bad thoughts i just boot up a random video game and play until i get exhausted.can anyone else relate?"

"7 years have passed, i lost 7 years. i want to have a future, i know i can work hard to accomplish, but so many bad experiences have left me such a mess. <e1>i can't interact with anyone</e1>, not because i don't want to its because <e2>i always say the wrong thing</e2>. depression has taken my coordination, memory, speech, and my focus. its sad really i had so much potential and i would have loved to live a healthy normal life. but its too much my memories haunt me at day and night. my depression has ruined so many relationships and i've even hurt my loved ones. i just want them to know that its not my fault and i have no idea where this depression came from."
everyone is completely selfish and addicted to work and tech.  i don't see how anyone can not be depressed looking at this horrible society/human species.
"how to stop feeling sad when you fuckedup the best girl i ever knew, i wish i could stop feeling this way, booze just make it easier to sleep at night"

"im gonna say it, im jealous. im jealous of people happier than me. im in highschool and <e1>ive been diagnosed with ocd and ptsd</e1> from <e2>how fucked up my life has been</e2>. im jealous of my friends and those around me who have good grades, are great athletes, have loving families, plenty of money, motivation, ambition, and plans for their future. everybody seems so productive meanwhile i can barely feed myself or get out of bed. <e3>it makes me feel guilty</e3> that <e4>im mad that everybody is so much happier than i am</e4>."
if i wear long sleeves/ and kinda long shorts/ no one will know/ how i have fun!i know its pretty morbid but its fine lols

"my younger sister just had her 2nd kid, while i have no one. the girl that i am in love with and who loves me as well just ditched me to sleep with her ex. after over a decade of believing that i would never find love and finding someone i could let my walls down i get hurt by someone i thought cared. someone i thought we were working towards something. in the end i'm just an emotional boyfriend. always has been and always will. she is in a toxic abusive relationship that she refuses to get help with or accept it. my job has no forward development and i'm in an industry that i hate as a manager (food service).it's about time i leave this world. i'm gonna spend a week or rwo getting things in order and figure out how i'm going to do it but i have already come to terms with it. i will be dead soon. i'm 35. single with no prospects. i've written letters to my family. just gotta say my farewells and purchase a gun this week. throwaway account but yea. life is meaningless and there's nothing for me here. fuck it all."

"i deserve this shit. im a horrible person. im always burdening people, making peoples life harder everything i go through i deserve it. i deserve these cuts i deserve this pain. im so fucked up in the head i apologize to everyone that has to tolerate me i know they all hate me everyone hates me i know it. and im not mad at them im mad at myself i hate it i hate myself i hate that ive never been happy i hate that im so fucked i cant do this no more when i die it really will make everyones life easier and im not just saying that its the truth i cause too many problems"

"i dont want to live anymore. but i also dont want to die.nothing i do can fulfill me, im just empty. im lonely. all i do is a waste of time. i dont enjoy anything anymore.i am afraid of my own thoughts. <e1>im afraid</e1> because of <e2>the fact that i think about suicide</e2>. because <e3>i know my family would miss me</e3>. <e4>that i would hurt them</e4>. i still have a bit of hope that i will be better in the future. that i will enjoy something again. that i will find someone who loves me. but that hope fades in my dark moments. my thoughts get foggy.im new to this. i feel like this for like 4 months now. i know many of you fought this war for years. i sincerely dont know how. <e5>i am so afraid that i will end my life and fuck up the lives of my parents</e5> because of<e6> a dark moment</e6>. that i will make a wrong decision. how can i help myself in those moments?"

"im sitting in the ruins of my life. there used to be something here, a person...a person with dreams, a future, hope, friends, passion. but that's gone now, and all that remains is the last debris of what once was, structures barely standing, crumbling.i'm looking around me in shock at how this happened, and i don'y believe i can rebuild it on my own, or with anyone for that matter. it's gone, and all there is left is to suffer, to spend my days wondering about what could have been in a different life path.maybe it's better to accept the loss, and lie down to sleep."

i have somewhat mentioned that my friends that i wanted to just disappear and never talk to them. i don't think they think that i would actually do that.<e1>i wanted to leave</e1> because <e2>i feel like they don't treat me near as well everyone else in their friendgroup</e2> but when i open up about it they act like i'm the most important person they've ever met.summer break just started and i have a choice to go a different school as them next year so if i wanted to go through with this i could.

"my mind's been broken for so long i really believe it's never going to be normal, fine.i'm going to continue being suicidal for the rest of my life, aren't i?i'll always need support, i'll never meet the goals required for my foolish ""dreams"". i'll rely on medication until the day i'll overdoseevery single day i wake up, take medicine, sit by my computer constantly switching between games and videos, smoke cigs, look at cats and exist.i text my support staff and let out my thoughts and stare at nothing in such deep boredomwhy keep breathing? i try to think of reasons to stay alive several hours a day but everything i'm able to come up with, sounds ridiculouswhy bother doing course tasks? i'm so tired no matter how much i sleep or how many naps i takethe world sucks :/ i try to connect with good people, but every nice word i say feels fake, as if i was wearing a hypothetical mask, every encouraging word i'm told makes me feel alonei wish i had someone to hug"

"the ""advice"" of self-fulfilling prophecies is just a fancy way of invalidating your struggles by saying its all in your head and that you can magically make your problems go away by just believing in yourself.i tried to make up for my autism  and squandering social opportunities in my past by putting myself out there and meeting people but it never worked. my friendships fell through the cracks. i am alone and now i am giving up. i never had a so and likely never will with all my issues. often one of the hardest pieces of ""advice"" i get about my low self-esteem and my flaws is that if you believe you're a loser then you will become one, if you worry about mistakes you will be a fuck up. if you think you will die loveless then you will never have a partner. now i am an analytical kind of person. how can you tell me it's only my beliefs holding me back when it's the failures i have experienced that have led me to forming those beliefs? i might have not met everybody out there to meet but isn't it a cause for concern when i am rejected much more than i am accepted in multiple places throughout life? also the few positive experiences happened randomly regardless of my mood at the time. bottom line is that i have many flaws, beliefs not being the first to drive a wedge between me and the rest of people my age."

"i've been taking it for around 6 months now. i feel okay with it, there's just times where i randomly break down crying my eyes out. i'm depressed, badly, so so so badly. i'm not really sure if it's working. my depression might be way worse than it is right now, but the meds are helping it. that's my problem.150mg, 2x/day.what should i do? please help"

"i have been using smoking to cope with my depressive feelings and anxiety but now that <e1>i have a underlying health condition</e1> aggravated by <e2>smoking</e2> i want to give up smoking- i stopped smoking for 1 day only and i went into a full-fledged mental breakdown where i cried the whole night and want to sh so badly. does anyone know how to cope with withdrawals of any kind?  it feels rly horrible that i can't quit, like i know having one cigarette a day isn't as bad as having 7 (which i used to) but i rly want to quit at the same time i'm scared i become super suicidal again. its either my mental health or physical health and honestly the way things are going i rly dont think i'm going to alive by the next 5 years lol"

"to preface this without giving to much personal information away. im and 18 year old boy and just graduated high school. off an on throughout the years (and especially the summer of 2020) ive had struggles of being sad without knowing a clear reason why. during last summer i had a breakdown and completely went ghost from my friends for about 3 months, deleting all of my social media. right now im thinking about doing  the same thing. <e1>i feel like a selfish bitch for even thinking about this</e1> because <e2>i know my friends care about me but i just cant do it anymore</e2>. i feel like im sinking and i have no idea why. <e3>ive never told anyone if i was struggling with depression</e3>, <e4>never been in any therapy or anything like that</e4> because <e5>i didnt want people to think im being an attention whore or something like that(not saying if you do those things that you are one)</e5> im not medicated and havent been diagnosed. ive thought about suicide on occasion but i doubt ill ever go through with it. idk what im struggling with is depression or what but i just feel lost. everything i was passionate about is just gone.so is this depression and if it is what should i do? sorry if this was all over the place btw."

"does anyone how how to clean up self harm wounds? like whether to use cold water, antiseptic cream etc, and gauze(?). the internet has pretty poor coverage on such material, especially if the self harm is over a large area (can't just use plaster or a little gauze, we are talking about over an entire arm/thigh). my house also doesn't have medical tape and sticky gauze which is pretty upsetting, but it does have other general first aid items like antiseptic cream?, alcohol wipes wtc.the last time my wounds oozed weird pus and smelt bad but thank god i was at home and just spammed water and hella wet wipes but i don't want to risk any more infections especially with my newer wounds."

"hey, i want to ask that why the person with depression or social anxiety are left alone by other people. ik it's tough to deal with us but ain't there anyone honest who'd like to stay with us. everyone get bored of me and move to newer people around and i'm always left alone, yes i agree i don't ask them to stay because <e1>i feel like something is wrong with me</e1> so <e2>they left</e2>. but still why it always happens with me. i also want to be loved and cared, want to be a special person to anyone who they don't ever wanna lose. but always at the end i'm seen as an side option and people get over me. everything is wrong with me, neither i'm good in study now nor i'm a good human being, i already ruined my relationship with my parents. i just want this covid lockdown to end, it's too much for me and i want to die soon. i'm really hopless from last 1 year, i'm just dragging my life."

"today is a fucking nightmare.one of my very dear friends, a boy who i love with my whole heart sent me a video. <e1>in this video he was walking towards the each of his balcony. after that he texted me 'i will do it'</e1>. <e2>i was so scared</e2>. i tried to convince him to not jump and after few minutes of texting he said that he will go back inside.i feel that it's all my fault. yesterday he found out that i have a crush on him... today he was avoiding me and even when i tried to talk with him he was ignoring me and was looking away. i texted him after lessons and everything seemed okay so i wasn't worried... and then this video.i really don't know what to do. i live far away from him and i can't come to check on him. i feel bad for not being able to help. i don't know what to do anymore.then there is another friend. we know each other only for 2 years but she is for sure my best friend. she also texted me today. she said that she's feeling empty inside. she wants to cry but at the same time she feel lost. i want to help her but she lives even further that the other friend i talked about.i'm mad at myself for not knowing how to help. please... if someone reads this... do you know what should i do? please... help me"

"its gotten really bad today to the point where im not sure i can go on anymore. im probably the most depressed ive ever been in my life. everything is so dark, nothing good happens to me. i feel like theres a dark cloud always hovering over me. no one will ever love me and i knew it was too good to be true all along that someone would. i dont think i can live with myself anymore for any more longer without actually killing myself. im sorry."

ive been struggling with depression for a while now. i wanted to know whats been the scariest part about it for people. <e1>for me its been my closest friends distancing themselves</e1> because <e2>they think its contagious being around me will make them depressed</e2> or <e3>they are scared</e3> or <e4>they dont want to be around someone who is depressed</e4>.

"just to get this straight out, i'm not suicidal.just, thoughts are always going through my head like'i could jump off this bridge right now, nothing's stopping me'or 'i could run in front of this bus if i really felt like it'and honestly, if there was just a button i could press to painlessly end my existence, i'd probably press it. obviously no such thing exists, and that might just be me 'thinking' i'd press it. but even just having that thought is... wrong.<e1>i'm sad</e1> because <e2>i'm not doing anything i like</e2>, and <e3>i'm not doing anything i like</e3> because <e4>whenever i start, i just feel... sadness</e4>. and always just want to go home and lie down.i'm not really sure where i'm going with this post, just felt like i finally wanted to get it into words somewhere."

<e1>i came here</e1> because <e2>depressed and suicidal people are the only real ones</e2>. no just be positive bullshitwhat has helped you with functioning existing and just wanting to continue?is it a person? hobbies? thoughts or actions. please let me know.i have really bad anxiety attacks and suicidal thoughts and walking with my mom has helped me. it only works temporarily for an hour or so before the bad thoughts come back but its something.

"so for years i fought the existential thought of death.  its caused major anxiety and depression that i'm slowly getting out of. i'm 29, clinically depressed for 15 years. i know a lot of people like myself think about purpose of life, being scared to die one day or scared to leave those close in heartbreak. im starting to realize, or grow, to the thought of not being scared  of death. instead i'm actually scared of not fulfilling my potential before death. it's not really that i have a goal for my potential; however how much better i feel knowing i tried my best every day based on any given circumstances. i hope this helps someone.i wish you all nothing but love and a happy healthy future."

"i hate that im always feeling so empty. because of <e1>covid</e1> <e2>im in a constantly between feeling fine and extremely depressed</e2>. when i do get extremely depressed i lose interest in all of my hobbies, i cant get myself to eat or properly take care of myself.im 20 and live with my dad, <e3>currently no job due to health issues</e3> so <e4>all of my interactions are with him and my online friends</e4>. i feel guilty for always wanting to talk to them but im just so lonely.. when no ones available i just sleep. <e5>ive been sleeping the last year and a half away</e5> cause <e6>everything had to be put to a halt</e6>.i dont know what to do when i feel the emptiness but its seriously affecting me. i dont want to be sleeping all the time but i have no reason to be awake either. i want to be able to enjoy my hobbies but i just cant."

"i waste my life and i can't go back, i wanna kill myself but i'm such a coward....i have big dreams and beautiful friends and everything, but <e1>i ruin everything when i was seventeen</e1> because <e2>i meet wrong people</e2> and as a influenced fuckin teen i fuck my life, now i'm 29, and i'm nothing, nothing to me, nothing for anybody. sorry my english i'm brazilian (and it's a big factor to become more depressed haha)"

"i am in a polygamous relationship one guy one girl. <e1>i have sever depression, sever anxiety, borderline personality disorder, and ptsd all medical diagnosed</e1>. so <e2>i have had an ubundance of stress lately and i am tired of fighting it</e2>. i've tried voicing my struggles, which are seemingly being ignored or told to get over. i walked home from work one car, bf was supposed to be at work. i get fucked up qt work have to leave, like feeling like throwing up. i walk home were saving money as much as possible to fix the car problem. i am down right suicidal. after nearly kicking down my own door, gf was supposed to be home, bf opens the door i don't fucking care. he runs back to whatever she was off to, to complain. how dare i? i go find a knife in the kitchen and put to my stomach. this makes a huge ass fight. why the fuck are they mad? why are they hurt? why does nothing i say matter? i finally thinking about myself and its the biggest problem that i don't want to.be in this constant abusive relationship with myself anymore?"

"<e1>my gf left me</e1> bc <e2>i was being a total asshole</e2>, <e3>my dad left our family</e3> and <e4>my job sucks ass</e4>. i was recently diagnosed with major depression disorder and am now on zoloft. all i want is my gf back and to be happy again and that seems incredibly unlikely now. i pray to whoever is listening that shell come back all day. i barely eat and just wanna be in bed all day long. everyone just says itll get better hang in there but its impossible for me right now. i just want a hug?."

hi i was wondering if hopefully this is the right place to ask this but me and my girlfriend have been long distance for the past year and <e1>shes diagnosed with clinical depression its normally very hard when im away</e1> because <e2>she tends to get very distant and feel alone</e2> when she is having a really hard time and goes to hang out with her friends and typically doesnt want to communicate with me at all and says that i just tend to not understand or relate to how she is feeling and i end up pushing her away im at a stand still now and really just want to do whatever i can to help i realize im very uninformed on how to properly deal with the situation i even will continuously ask her what can i do to better be there for her but she doesnt really respond or says she doesnt know and her therapist even sent me a email on how to be there for a partner thats in therapy but she never sent me anything on how to be a better partner for moments when her depression is very bad im scared whatever i do now my makes things worst and lose her the last time she got this depressed we ended up splitting up and i just dont know how to address this situation

"can someone please explain to me how depression can take so much from a person? how can it completely change who you are as a person so quickly, change how you feel towards people, change how you used to find joy in the little things, in anything really? i've never been through anything like this and see no way out. it makes me mad that i have to stuggle everyday to get back to who i was when it was all so natural before. sorry for the pity party just feel so stuck with where i am."

"i spend my days working and feeling low. i have missed out on the most valuable years of my life and i have long since realized that my life is mediocre and empty. i have done nothing, accomplished nothing, learned nothing.i am an empty husk of the man i was supposed to be, a failure, and an immature loser.i haven't seen anything, been anywhere, or met anyone. i failed in most of my life and i have no confidence or desire to do anything. i am not excited by life and i have lost what little spark i had.i am on the bench while others my age are on the starting lineup.<e1> all i can do is watch</e1> because <e2>i'm not good enough to play</e2>"

"so my mom was never satisfied with me. she studied hard as a child but was never on top. she got divorced from her first husband and has 6 kids. she always pushes me to be on top and gets mad at me whenever i make a mistake(no matter how big or small it is) or whenever i'm not on rank 1 in our school. this year has been hard for me, i don't think i'm gonna be on rank 1 this grading. i also skipped 2 of my classes today and she asked me why i skipped again. i want to tell her that i don't have the motivation to do so and even if i don't want to skip my body just doesn't move. i live in a country where parents don't take mental illness seriously. she will constantly put her hands on me and shout hateful words to me whenever she's stressed and i did something she didn't like. please give me a valid excuse as to why i didn't attend classes today. she is asking me for an answer and i don't know what to tell her. she'll be home in a few hours and i don't know what to do. im sorry to bother anyone this might not seem to be a big deal but for me it is. thank you so much for reading this."

so my gf told me that she only wants to be friends from now on and <e1>i sort of went loopy and went off at her</e1>. so basically <e2>ive fucked the chances of ever getting back with her</e2>. i cant really stop thinking about it and im having constant guilt and regret. <e3>cant sleep</e3> because <e4>shes not there anymore</e4>. so i know im mentally not all there so i was wondering if anyone could help. should mentally unstable people be in relationships? ive been constantly depressed for about 2 years straight now and its only getting worse since she left. i was happy with her but when she would leave i would feel like shit again. <e5>im just wondering</e5> because <e6>i feel like the smallest crack in the relationship made me go mad</e6>.
im never gonna get into college or have a future. im letting down my family and i think it would be better if i was not here. i dont mean to sound cliche but i sound very cliche. thats all.

"long story short i had some childhood trauma that resulted in pretty regular bouts of depression in my now adulthood (i'm almost 24). it doesn't happen on a cycle or anything its pretty random but it happens at least once every month or two and lasts for a few days to a week. i haven't seen a therapist and frankly can't really afford it, not sure it would really help anyway...the point of me coming here today is that my boyfriend, who i have known for 11 years and is truly the best thing to ever happen to me, <e1>just doesn't understand depression and gets frustrated and snaps at me</e1> <e2>when i'm in a depressive state</e2>. he tries really hard and has read a lot on depression etc but he just can't control the way he acts sometimes and it's really hurtful and just makes it very difficult for me to be around him when i'm going through it. <e3>it sucks</e3> because <e4>i wish he was more comforting and understanding</e4> but i can imagine <e5>its hard to be with someone who has depression when you just cannot understand why they are the way that they are</e5>...so <e6>sometimes i feel like he would be way better off without me in his life</e6> ): does anyone have advice or words of affirmation? i'm just having a really hard time."

"hi there this has been bottled up in me for awhile. at the start of the year i was fortunate with a few trades and ended up with 120k. but unfortunately due to <e1>the whole crypto hype and mania</e1> that <e2>i bought into, now im down 60k</e2>. that already had me pretty upset. but it wasn't even the kicker. <e3>my sister recently told me she is diagnosed with cancer</e3> and <e4>i am devastated</e4>. she could've really used that 120k. i am so lost right now she doesn't want to tell my mother yet. <e5>and honestly i'm having such a difficult time keeping this to myself</e5>. so <e6>i thought of reddit as i guess a way of coping</e6>."

"hey there, i'll get into the topic, <e1>all my life i've been lonely and bullied</e1>, <e2>even my brother bullied me at school</e2> .<e3>people didn't like me</e3>. even though they don't like me now as well. i never had many friends or been invited to a party ;). i have only 4 friends, they don't chat with me often or invite me somewhere. when i see my classmates or my friends snapchat photo,  <e4>i feel sad and anxious</e4>,  because <e5>i start to think why they don't like me</e5> or maybe is it because i'm ugly? <e6>lately i've been feeling very depressed</e6> because <e7>i don't have any caring friends... or friends to hang out</e7> .. i just stand ahead my mirror and repeat to myself why i am ugly or why people don't like me . sometimes <e8>i get so angry</e8> that <e9>i hit alot  myself  on hands or legs</e9> ."

physical and sexual abuse will do that to a girl. why even bother living when im tormented by the past? 10 years of things being normal and i still feel suicidal. 22 y/o girl. nothing makes me feel happy.

"im in a bad state of mind right now. im a uni student and i have 3 deadlines due in very soon and <e1>im stressing</e1> because <e2>im having a complete mental breakdown right now</e2>.my aunty died during lockdown and she was a big part of my life and i think im only processing it now. <e3>she died due to cancer</e3> because <e4>they wouldnt treat her due to covid</e4>. <e5>she looked after me a lot when i was younger</e5> because <e6>my mum was caring for my brother who had cancer and later died of it</e6> .<e7>my mum doesnt approve of my partner</e7> and so <e8>shes made our relationship really difficult at times</e8> . (she doesnt like that hes not rich). during lockdown she threatened him so he called the police on her. she then called the police back and said he was withholding my keys and bank card - this just wasnt true at all. it was just out of pettiness . but it was me that had to deal with this.i had to go out to a police van in the middle of the night and explain to them that i wasnt a victim of abuse and that my mum was lying.my dad who abandoned me as a baby got back in touch and <e9>when i said i couldnt meet up with him because of lockdown</e9>, <e10>he became nasty and sent a bunch of mean posts</e10>.all of this has really impacted my studies and i dont feel able to get my assignments done. i feel like such a fucking failure and really weak  and im just done with this life thing."

"the last few weeks have been rough on me by throwing me in a scenario where i'm expected to be more strong than i actually am (i don't really want to mention it at this moment), and it's taken a toll on me. i've been drinking more often, i feel too depressed to play video games or write music, i deactivated pretty much every social media account other than reddit... i just feel like nothing is okay."

"looking for some people with some experience on the matter.i've  been depressed for a long time and mainly face psychosomatic symptoms  like chronic fatigue (not low motivation however) and, approproately  enough, my eyes have changed a lot. never fully open, somehow even  tilted downwards on the outer edges, tired-/sad-looking, permanently,  even when i feel kind of good. <e1>i don't even know the physiological  mechanisms behind this</e1>, because <e2>it hasn't always been like this</e2> and <e3>a  lot of depressed people look this way</e3>, hence <e4>it must be directly linked  to the disorder</e4>.these are not the  result of any other underlying health condition (according to doctors)  nor of an unhealthy lifestyle. i'm outside a lot, do sports, i don't eat  that well but i'm of normal weight without any extreme diet.<e5>this  is pretty awful</e5> because <e6>my depression stems from my looks</e6> and <e7>the  related rejection you face as an unattractive person in society</e7>. so <e8>it's  a classic vicious cycle of bad</e8> looks causing depression which in return  worsens the appearance and so on.does anyone have any experience with or knowledge about this? what exactly causes this and what can be done about it?"

"sitting in the dark with a paralysed mind, the gentle breeze from the open window whilst my emotions close and withdraw once again. here i go pushing myself away. thoughts creep in and out momentarily, yet i remain still, processing and over analysing what moments pass.im not sure whats dragged my hand deeper into the depths ive spent months trying to claw out from. i thought i cut these thoughts out of my memory. the excuses spoken in silence begin to pile up as i flirt with the bottle.i cant forget you; i try all the time.i cannot forget you, with your grip in mine.is there signs of sunshine breaking this eternal darkness, knowing everything within me begins to break away, my breathing would pass, causing a sense of panic anxiety to get my heart racing, just to feel something again.cant you hear it in the silence? cant you hear me calling out your name? thats what i tell myself, paranoia and desperation beg for a response. ive got something burning coursing through these cold veins. in the words i speak, somehow, i get lost in between. when to suffer in silence or to break it all with each breath that i breathe.maybe ill just hold it all in again, pass out until i dont feel the same."

"(tw: self harm, and suicidal stuff) i rarely talk to them now, they are pretty much toxic. we were talking about deppression and my friends were saying how deppressed and ""suicidal"" (<e1>i really don't believe it</e1> because <e2>they've never attempted suicide</e2> and <e3>never self harmed</e3>, and i know they are doing it for attention but i'll never know) they are, and i say how i've attempted suicide a few times, and that i self harm. they obviously didn't care and said that i was not as deppressed as them and to stop doing this for attention. they started rambling on how their lives were worse than mine. whenever they invite me to a group chat they start bad mouthing me even though i never said anything and saying that i'm an attention seeker, they also then act suddenly deppressed for attention, and then say rude things (even sometimes mean things about the other person), then delete it, i point it out but then they accuse me that nothing happened.honestly, at this point it makes me wanna end it all even more."

"hello, my name is nicolas. 18 years old from colombiai have been dealing with depression for like 3 years since my father's death... i went to therapy but my doctor said that i had change for good but i dont think so. i tried to poison myself like 2 months ago.... i feel like a worthless piece of trash, ppl says that im a good person, but my self steem is so low that i think they are lying. <e1>i quit college</e1>, cuz <e2>i have a lot of insecurities</e2>. this been soo long that i try to cry but sometimes i cant. i know that life is hard for everyone but i just cant keep going. i hate my family they dont understand how im feeling.... but <e3>i hate myself the most</e3> cuz <e4>im a coward, useless shit</e4>, i regret everything....im with them but i feel so lonely everytime. im so shy and ashamed of myself to speak to my virtual friends.... they dont deserve someone like me as their friend.... i deserve to die i dont have any value. im tired of solitude even if im an introvert its enough. i just want to vanish from this world. my mom made me hate hugs i always felt hers so fake welp everyone's....even now---- i cant cry whats wrong with me i wanna die but im so scared of death as well. pathetic... sorry everyone"

"after i finish school i will be happy, after i marry him i'll be happy, after i leave that job i'll be happy, after i get a dog i'll be happy. nope. how do i stop going in this never ending circle filled with disappointment. every time i end up not happy i feel even worse. can't get out of this rut."

"i hate the way i look so much. i have horrible self-esteem. i am out today to get my vaccine shot. i dont know why but i just hate what i see of myself. this is all just making my mental health worse. the people around me really dont know how much this effects me. people are so lucky to look good. i was never self-conscious of my look until i became an adult. the way my face looks, the way this shirt fits, just everything. i wish for one day i could at least be happy."

i just hurt myself for the first time in five months. why doesn't my best friend want to be my friend anymore what is wrong with me why does everyone hate me. they all really do this time i'm not making it up i'm so sad i want to keep hurting myself until i die

"i am currently in my usual several weeks of depression.  no hope and no hunger. contrary to my loss of appetite, i packed two toasts in the toaster and prepared margarine and salami in the kitchen. now my mother has asked me to put away the pillows on the terrace while she gets ready for work. as i put a few pillows away, i hear my mother say to my father: ""i'm going to go right away. max wanted to get something to eat. remember, he hasn't eaten anything today.""i was so happy to see my parents worry about me behind my back. even now, a few hours later, with two toasts in my stomach, <e1>i'm still overjoyed</e1> to <e2>hear that conversation</e2>. a small spark of light during a week-long solar eclipse.i want to remind you that when you feel lonely and abandoned, there are still people behind your back who worry about you."

"yet my ex has blocked me on everything and <e1>im depressed</e1> that <e2>2 years was nothing but a lie</e2>. i made a lot of mistakes but i reached out and told her im not doing good and needed to talk and she never responded, just blocked. being at your lowest of lows and the one who you thought at one point loved you so much wont even talk to you. goodnight reddit"

"ima be honest with all of you. im not even a girl. im just a guy who is just lonely and wears a mask on the internet. i hate myself and i hate my life, i do not wish i was alive. i wish i was dead but <e1>i know i cant make that decision</e1> because <e2>ill hurt my family in the process</e2>. the fact that <e3>i cant do it</e3>, makes me feel even more trapped and more in pain. so <e4>i turn to the internet</e4>. the internet is the only place where i get to chose to be someone different and where i can finally tell anyone about myself. pretending to be someone else online occupies my brain and keeps me from thinking about the pain or feeling the pain. wearing this invisible mask, is my way of coping with the pain im going through. <e5>i cry sometimes</e5> because <e6>i want to give up and die so so bad</e6>, but i know i cant. this is why i always try to do anything that keeps my brain occupied. im not proud of what im doing, because i know im lying to my friends. i always try to keep myself busy from feeling that guilt. im basically running away from my pain. most of you will probably call me a horrible human being. i dont blame you, i dont deserve to live. im pathetic for pretending to be someone im not. i hope something out there kills me."

i am done with all the emptiness inside me. it pains me to see myself in a pathetic state every day. this emptiness is burning me from inside. i prefer loneliness and i dont want other to interact with me. i am socially awkward and most people think my perspective about the society is evil and i need therapy. i dont feel anything for anyone even my own family. the world seems empty and hollow to me with no meaning.my own life has no meaning.this emptiness is increasing day by day and i cant fo anything about it.the double standards of the people disgusts me.i dont think about suicidal but this is worse than suicide.

"hi there. 25y/o male. us. i have struggled with depression for most of my life since about the age of 12. in my younger years i used to self harm. when i moved off to college i slept around trying to feel something. now that im an adult with a job i hate, single, no romantic partners of any sort, friends but when i try to open up all i get told is itll get better and were here if you need to talk but talking to them feels empty. like im talking down a empty hall way.therapy helps temporarily. i meet with my therapist once a week and by day 3 in between sessions its all back. of course i have good days where i dont think about it all, but theyre few and far in between. im not actively suicidal. like im not making plans to or want to kill myself, but if i say, got into a car accident on the way home from work, i wouldnt be mad. not entirely sure what a post on reddit is going to benefit. maybe i just need to vent? or have someone steady to talk to?"

"so my  little sister (14)  was diagnosed with anxiety and depression recently, i'm very worried about her but i'm not treating her any different, i still fight with her as we are siblings. my mom doesn't understand this , she's been tiptoeing around my sister like crazy. my sister doesn't like this, my mom didn't even think my sister noticed but her being overcareful is very obvious. anyways, whenever i say something slightly mean to my sister, even jokingly my mom gets all weird and is like ""she's having a hard time right now, and gets really mad at me, which i think stresses my sister out. i asked my sister awhile ago and she said she doesn't want me to act weird/be  fake nice.  i know that, i'm worried about my sister too, but it doesn't mean i'm going to tiptoe around her, or be nice to her 100% of the time. this morning i kinda called her out , saying my sister isn't stupid and she knows that my mom is tiptoeing around her.anyways, i kinda need some input on this , should i be nice to my sister 100% of the time and never <e1>say anything mean to her</e1> due to <e2>the fact that she was diagnosed with depression</e2>?"

"i'm just tired of being disappointed from people. i try to be there for as many of my friends as i can when they are stressed or depressed while making an effort to not seem depressed myself.<e1>right now i'm in a really bad mental state</e1> from <e2>a culmination of stress from work</e2>, <e3>lack of friends to talk or hang out with after work</e3> and <e4>lack of sleep (caused by the depression)</e4>. even at this point i'm still trying to be here for one of my closest friends which is in a bad spot but she has an so at home to get back to, i don't. i'm just tired of all this, i'm getting older and older and stuff like this stays the same. i realise that being alone and loving yourself should be as important (or even more important) as being there for others, but being alone and not having people to talk to really sucks.just as a clarification, i am not suicidal. i was suicidal when i was younger but eventually realised that my death would possibly lead to my parents suicide too and i can't fathom the thought of that."

"i am a student of it, and i am going to be graduate this year but honestly, i don't know a single coding language, in covid, my college was off and i tried to learn to code but when i started to watch tutorials i don't even get a single word! now the point is that what the fuck will be done when i will be graduate, i was dreaming that i will be a fucking software engineer but now i am depressed i tried a lot to learn things properly but i am not getting a single word of it! i am ? depressed.studentdiaries #gradution #csit #informationtechnology #student #coding #programming"

"i'm the common denominator. no matter what i do, most people don't want to socialize with me or care to know me, most decent paying companies won't hire me, nobody is interested in dating me.i'm not suicidal or anything, but i just want to give this society the middle finger and just hike and play music...they always bother me about finding a better job. they always tell me i need to socialize and talk more. <e1>they always bother me</e1> about the fact that <e2>i'm always single</e2>... i try to talk with others.. i send out resumes... i always try to relefct on things i can improve... rarely is there any success. i could disappear tomorrow and only my parents and my two friends would care... at least i have them, for now.i almost believe that i'm part of some sadistic experiment, where my overlords keep encouraging me to try harder, just to pull the carrot further away so they can be amused...i am the common denominator to why i'm not useful to this society, so why try?"

"no matter how many times i tell people flat out that i'm depressed and i don't want to live in this world anymore, they don't take it seriously. one person said i should ""talk to someone"", implying that someone not be them of course. i mention that i wish daily for some kind of accident to take me out, and they brush past it. nobody is listening. i say i won't be here some day, they don't comment. nobody cares. <e1>part of me is glad they don't care</e1>, because <e2>i don't want to restrict my freedom to act on that impulse if and when that day comes</e2>. part of me wishes they would show even a little that they care about me. whether i keep my dark thoughts to myself or share them bluntly with the world, it doesn't matter. the world doesn't care. if the world doesn't care, then why do i care to bein it? why do i keep choosing to stay in it? i like being alive, but i also am sick of feeling this way. i'm sick of people being like they are. if i went away, they'd act surprised, as if i didn't spend all this time warning them that this might happen. even if they listened, would it change anything?"

"i went to a therapist at my university last fall to work through some things. didn't help too much but she told me i most likely am depressed (something i figured but it was good to hear a professional tell me)my girlfriend of three years broke up with me a few weeks ago which pushed me to work on my mental health. i broke down and told my mom everything about how i've been feeling for the past like 7 years (depression, anxiety, disordered eating) and she scheduled an appointment for me to visit a doctor.my appointment is tomorrow and i'm really anxious and not sure what to expect. i guess i'm hoping to get put on some sort of antidepressant but i'm worried about taking those. i'm scared of gaining weight and the i'll feelings as my body gets used to them. <e1>i'm scared</e1> because <e2>a lot of people do commit after starting them</e2>.idk, in just worried. some days i feel like everything is unbearable, while other days like tonight i feel like i'm okay."
