"i don't mean to advocate for suicide in any way, but a major hurdle in the stigma against mental illness and depression in particular is the criminal treatment of suicides: the decedent's phone and computer are confiscated as 'evidence;' foul play is suspected until proven otherwise; and <e1>you can go to prison for self-harm</e1> just as easily as for <e2>harming others</e2>.a path to the future of mental health acceptance and openness begins with the decriminalization of suicide and empathy towards those with suicidal ideations. it's the humane thing to do."

"i've been clinically depressed for maybe a decade, little less. it has been at its worst, but it is always faintly there when it's not. very bad apathy, one apathy situation was put for seven months.i've entered apathy again, after a three or four month break. everything is cringe worthy, things i would read and do. i was skimming my pool this morning, and i thought it was really stupid. i'm very disinterested in daily life, i.d.k. what to do... it is not that i am put on my phone all day, it is easier for me to do outdoor activities and cleaning i.d.k. how to do all on my phone.any replies appreciated."

"<e1>afraid to let myself sleep</e1> 'cause <e2>that means letting tf go for a second- (not distracting or avoiding)</e2>...but i love living in my dreams, and then im afraid to wake up. same goes for sobriety.i dream of the life id die for every night and just want to sray there. but <e3>going to sleep scares me</e3> because <e4>i know i have to wake up</e4>.i am fortunate in this physical existance, despite what i tell myself. but the point is, i for some reason am done existing on this plane. but  <e5>i feel like i should only try and elongate and extend this existence in this physical form</e5> because <e6>i am fortunate</e6>. but i cannot help but just want to put an end to my soul's existence"

"<e1>im gonna be in the 8th grade again next year</e1>. got held back in 7th for missing too much school, and then i was too depressed in 8th to finish work (mostly due to <e2>the fact i was a grade behind</e2> and <e3>couldn't relate to anyone in my grade</e3>). so yeah. im in 8th again. i just want friends my own age. i dont wanna talk to 8th graders man. what the fuck do i do?? do i finish 8th again so im in highschool when im 16 or do i drop out and get my ged?? i feel so fucking alone irl."

"one the the symptom i have bc of depression is dissociation, and i feel weird but i kinda... like it? i know it's weird, idk why i like it, even though after it my left eye make some weird popping thingy... <e1>i still like it</e1>, so <e2>i often try to dissociate on my own</e2>, and it actually work i guess '?? but immediately after i stop, <e3>i feel really guilty and bad</e3> because <e4>i have the impression that i'm faking everything</e4>, even though i'm not... it's normal??"

"a self harm solutionknives are scary, but appealing?pain too visible, pain too fleetingi hold it and starei hope there's nobody therei'm just cant do it, im too fucking scaredso come on you piece of shit,think fucker thinki can't wash my blood down a sinki tried to hurt myself with ink"

why do i make major mistakes again and again? i can't live my life just learning from mistakes again and again and again. a few learnings here and there can be healthy but when it this fucking loop going to come to an end. either i am lacking in a hundred different ways or its just bad luck times 50 everytime i encounter such a situation.this is in context of losing out on certain parts of my university degree that i am still enrolled on but i still feel i am losing out. if anyone can relate i would love to know more!

"i am a student at university, before starting my course i was genuinely excited and motivated but like all things with me i lose that motivation as time goes by. <e1>in my first semester i simple was a dick and did not study as much for a test</e1>. <e2>it turned out (to my suprise) that that particular score would make my program general and shorter (a more common course with no advantages)</e2>.depression hit hard and i felt i had no purpose, what hurt more was the fact that it was all my fault and i was dubious of the rules and requirements but this is one thing i hate about myself - where i simply lose interest for no apparent reason and then violently blame myself. this is now a loop, there is always something that i miss out on.as much as people say ""you learn from your mistakes"", my life is only making and learning from new mistakes and this isn't taking me anywhere :( the incident above was one of many such events.i was always looked at as a ""smart"" student but i can't say if mistakes find me or i find them unknowingly. <e3>i know i am not at the level to drop out but i am close to that</e3> so <e4>i find myself merely drifting</e4>."

"i'm 26 and sadly i'm used to live with depression, i never talk to anyone about it b/c <e1>i've never had any friends and live in the  usa</e1> so <e2>can't afford professional help</e2>. the one person i talked to about it just said that it's all in my head and made me feel stupid. <e3>like i'm not allowed to be depressed</e3> because <e4>i'm better off than a homeless person etc</e4>. but it's been more than a decade, been crying myself to sleep and wishing i woke up dead since i was 13 how can i be making this up. i can't stand the heaviness in my chest when crying and i'm supposed to just shake it off? i know it's on me but i've never had someone say positive things about me so that would help with my self worth i think."

"i don't think i even feel sad about things anymore, i just feel very disinterested. <e1>i don't feel interested in living</e1> because <e2>nothing really excites or saddens me</e2>. i just don't feel like doing anything really, except eating, that's really it."

"i dont know if anyone will read this but as a lurker here, i enjoy this community a lot. it made me realise that the things ive been through and the emotions ive experienced are a shared experience among all of us.<e1>im forgetful, im very insecure, i wear a mask of happiness</e1> because <e2>no one wants to know how i truly feel</e2>, i feel worthless, i constantly have thoughts of dying, im cynical, i struggle to find reasons to keep on living and depression feels like a weight that drags me down until i can no longer move forward with my life. most of the time, i feel numb until im forced to confront how i truly feel and then i start crying out of nowhere. but ive realised not the only one feeling this way and because of <e3>that</e3>, <e4>i feel somehow less alone and scared</e4>."

"i am 26 yo male, i have a good job and all but i am always depressed. now i don't think of hurting myself or anything but i don't want to do anything. i only want to lie there in my bed doing absolutely nothing and thinking about past and future. i am not able to live the present. <e1>i am always anxious</e1> and <e2>that affect my work also</e2>. i mess up trivial task related to my work. please help."

its really emotionally taxing to have severe mood swings. i know im stating the obvious; i just need to get it out somewhere. all i want to do is sleep. i slept for 14 hours yesterday and can barely keep my eyes open right now.

"ive been kinda struggling with sadness since all this covid-19 stuff has been happening i have good friends who i love and loving parents yet i still feel empty i dont know whats wrong i just feel so worthless and lonely i feel like if i had a relationship or something it would help but i know that wont happen. this was just me venting a little sorry if this was a burden, i know that there are people actually struggling someone actually struggling and i wish them the best."

"i dont want to die i just want to never have been born to begin with. i hate seeing all the shit going on in the world. my therapist encourages me to see the good and appreciate the happy moments but how can happy moments exist when so many bad things are happening. every time a happy moment occurs or i read something uplifting in the news <e1>i feel guilty</e1> for <e2>feeling good</e2>. i think im a bad person. i feel very happy when i receive good news and ignore all the bad. <e3>im a bad person</e3> because <e4>i see all the bad</e4>, get overwhelmed, <e5>do absolutely nothing to help</e5> because <e6>these problems are daunting and seem so much bigger than me</e6>. even when i try to help i end up messing things up. i dont want to be here and its very selfish of me. does anyone else think like this?"

"i feel like im having a depressive episode? <e1>i mean im not really sure</e1> because <e2>a week ago i was fine( no thoughts no sadness, nothing.)</e2> but this week out of nowhere ive been bombarded with the killing myself thouvhts? like out of nowhere? and its incredibly scary like i want to live, but my mind is 24/7 telling me to just die. & after a while it starts to genuinely wear me down and well. this shit is hard. especially since i get random anxiety rushes and just wanna do something like what do i do???? i want to get out of this so bad but it is draining as hell. can any of you just give some uplifting words so i that i can look back at them and try and push forward"

"i could be surrounded by people but i feel totally alone. in a giant crowd and i get claustrophobic but i want it all to stop. i just sometimes want the world to silence itself and slow down so i can just understand what the hell is going on. i see so much information everyday and my brain tries to absorb it all (adhd) <e1>but i just cant</e1> because <e2>i cant process it all</e2>. <e3>i seem to be at fault for all my social interactions</e3> because <e4>i just cant stop focusing on what is wrong with me</e4>. i can talk to people you know thats what they say but most dont get it, that talking to someone i can still feel alone.<e5>im just at a loss</e5> because <e6>i cant understand how or what i fix to not feel so useless and invisible</e6>."

"depression feels like you are sitting on the edge while hugging your knees tightly against your chest and your back facing the cliff. if you let loose your arms, relax and just lean back, the pull of gravity will have you losing balance as you tip over and fall right off the cliff.it's hard to continue on holding this position. your arms will grow stiff and your legs will go numb. then your neck and back begins to ache and your body and mind grows tired. you would want to stretch and rest. you start to wish to sleep. you wish to forget everything, let loose for a moment, and sleep ... but if you do, your body will relax, your posture will soften, and before you know it, your head will start to lean back along with the rest of your body, and you'll fall.depression, is exhausting. it's like living a life without sleep. people will tell you how tired you look. some will tell you to endure. some will say you just lack determination. some will even tell you that you sat yourself here and that you brought it upon yourself.but when you first sat down here to rest, this place has yet to become a cliff. it's just... the soil here wasn't very solid and the weather here was not too great."

"i was self medicating with street quality ketamine for about two months until my parents found me high as a kite one night about a month ago. as punishment they took away my phone for two weeks and wont let me see my friends until at least the end of june most likely end of july, early august.<e1>my mental health due to this has shot right down over the past few weeks</e1> because <e2>now</e2>, even though i have my phone back and can message them, its not the same as seeing them and they were one of the last things giving me that burst of happiness. <e3>some of my friends are really slow at replying</e3> and because <e4>my parents have given me a phone curfew as well i cant really talk to them as much as i used to</e4>.ive started counselling and anti depressants in the past few weeks but this is really playing on my mind and dragging my mental health down. the distance from my friends is fucking with my mind and while i understand why my parents are doing it, my friends gave me happiness and theyve taken that away and i just dont know what to do."

"im 17, in a month im going on summer break and ill be done with school. all my friends, literally everyone i know goes to a different school with other subjects. they take more science and math. theyre all very academic and smart. they study hard, they get good grades and communicate with their teachers even after class. i dont have any of that. <e1>it has been so hard to see them become intelligent useful people of society while im rotting away in my room</e1>, <e2>failing the subjects i chose because i thought i was good at them</e2>. im realizing now, a month before break that i am actually going to be a failure. my parents dont know how bad im doing, ive always been good in school before. my friends are going to be disappointed and im actively ruining my future. i know theyll all be successful ceos, architects, doctors etc while i might end up as a cashier for the rest of my life. <e3>i cant do anything now</e3> because <e4>grades are practically set already and i cant make them better next year</e4>. <e5>ive had suicidal thoughts</e5> because of <e6>this</e6>, <e7>and other reasons for such a long time</e7> that i almost feel like im just waiting for myself to do it, like its just supposed to happen."

"after years of being depressed and just fighting it on my own, i finally made the jump to starting on anti depressants. certain things going on in my life right now had pushed me to my breaking point, i knew i was gonna either blow my brains out or drive off the bridge next to my house. <e1>i ended up cutting myself and my wife was upset</e1>, so <e2>i wanted to at least try to do something</e2>. i got on wellbutrin and it's been 2 weeks now, i don't necessarily feel better.. but i'm numb. the things that would normally make me think of a gun or the bridge just sort of make me angry now. i don't know if it's a good thing or not, but i'm giving this my best shot. i want to be here not for myself but for my wife that has a lot on her plate, sometimes it feels like she doesn't care about me but i know deep down that can't be the case.idk if talk about medicine is allowed here but i just needed a place to vent hopefully without judgement or a lecture about how i'm fucking up or being mean."

"ive been abandoned by my family, begged my mom to come see me last night for today and she wouldnt come... i begged and begged for her too even let her know im suicidal...i have no friends besides my noel, ive lost my tattoo job, ive lost my who i am as a person.  finally left my piece of shit boyfriend but now i am all alone with no real reason to get up in the morning besides taking care of my dog.& <e1>even my dog looks at me like hes sad</e1> because <e2>we never do anything anymore</e2>.i just dont wanna try anymore, ive completely checked out of life and giving a fuck about it"

"hey. another random internet stranger here.i feel like everything i do either gets thrown into the deepest parts of the trash or that my deeds are somehow transformed into a new situation that opresses me.-i get dumped and cheated on by my girlfriend-awfully stacking test scores despite weeks of hard work-missiles. fucking missiles.i wont go into any details and i can still contain myself and keep my cool, but im afraid it may collapse. anything i do becomes a bad thing and any attempt at success becomes an awful failure, from one bad thing that stacks to another two and keeps descending in a downwards spiral of emotions. <e1>my cohorts tell me im overreacting and that im turning it into trauma, but i have no idea what else should i do and how to avoid feeling these emotions</e1>, because <e2>every time i tried, a new and worse case just gets thrown at me out of the cold blue</e2>."

"<e1>i wanted to share this</e1> because <e2>its been so long since something like this has happened to me</e2> and <e3>i have no one to talk about it to</e3>. i finally motivated myself to get out of bed and for the first time in so long i went to the park. because of <e4>temperature today</e4> <e5>not many people were there, in fact almost none</e5>. i sat down on a chair under a tree and just watched the world. there were two kittens trying to catch a butterfly, birds flying overhead, a really pleasant breeze, a leaf fell off a tree and flowed in the wind, so many shades of green were in my eyes and old station atmos playing on spotify, there was no one anywhere in sight, i relaxed my body took a deep breath, and kept breathing as slow as i could. and for the first time in as long as i could remember, i started to laugh. i dont even know why. it was just the absurdity of the moment. it felt so unreal. its been so long that i forgot these feelings existed. after i was done i sat there with a smile on my face. phone on do not disturb. and just enjoyed the moment. for the first time in my life i think i can honestly say im glad to be alive."

"before start, <e1>my english isn't the best</e1> because <e2>not it's my native lenguage</e2>.well, i tried kill myself 2 times but was like a ""cry for help"" and <e3>that was pathetic</e3>. because <e4>i didn't want to kill myself</e4> but now i'm secure i'm going to hang myself this year and <e5>it's ironic</e5> because <e6>i'm really good in school</e6> and i'm still so good in school.but i have familiar problems, and i don't know if i have social anxiety but i'm feeling something like that since years ago, the only difference now, i'm feeling it worst. ironically, <e7>i have friends irl and they love me so much, and it's wow for me</e7> because <e8>years ago i suffered bullying and just, i'm feeling i don't deserve have friends</e8>.the funny thing it's, after post this <e9>i will do my homework and follow alive</e9>, because <e10>i don't want to die still</e10>, i'm preparing myself for that still.<e11>i thought everything would be fine</e11> because <e12>like 2 weeks before everything looked better but was a so short period of time</e12>.everyday i have suicidal thoughts and that make me feel extra stressed, i wish so much this ends.thanks for read this if somebody read this."

"first and foremost, i would like everyone to know i'm intoxicated. it does t change the way i feel, even when i am sober. i wish in the u.s that assisted suicide was legal. i have lived a good life at best. i know that i could do better via organ donation. nothing in my life is hard or bad enough to warrant suicid, but that's the way i feel. my organs are good enough to donate right this moment, why not let me be helpful? i just want to make the world a better place without me. what's the harm in that? who would notice 9-12 months from now that i wasn't there besides my wife and family? it doesn't bother me i just want to be happy and appreciated. i'd like to be reincarnated into a tortoise ?if possible."

"im not against having kids at all in fact ill probably end up having kids in the future but i feel that theres no denying that having kids is always selfish in some aspect if you think about itsure for some people life is amazing and theyre glad they were born but if you were never born you wouldnt know what life entails so it doesnt matterive had some good moments in my life but id still rather be non existent. every second of life theres always something to worry about, were always trying to pursue happiness but what even is happiness? now im trapped in this body. im stuck with being alive and theres no way out besides killing myself, but that would devastate my family."

"i just want friends i don't want to be alone anymore i want to feel like i am worth something i want a job i like and not one i hate waking up for. i want a girlfriend and to know what its like to feel wanted i want to enjoy whats left of my already wasted youth (i'm 22) i want to actually have memorable experiences i want my to get rid of my massive student loan debt i want to learn to actually like myself and not feel like i'm worthless i want to stop feeling like an outsider and stop spending all my free time alone i want to actually look foreward to things again i want to feel happy againi don't understand how speaking to someone for 45 minutes would magically change all my problems that cause me unhappiness. why would i pay for that. they haven't lived my life, they don't know my problems. i want a real solution to help me."

"i've been suicidally exhausted for 2 years now, sleeping 16 hours a night, and neither ssris or snris have made a difference. however, i got diagnosed with sleep apnea today, and i'm hopeful that getting a cpap machine will finally even me out.lots of depression articles say to get your thyroid tested if you're feeling depressed, but not many mention getting a sleep study. if you're tired all the time, to the extent that you don't want to live anymore, i recommend checking to see if sleep apnea is the cause."

"here's the thing. i'm feeling intensely anxious and suicidal right now. <e1>i've pissed my mother off beyond belief today</e1> because <e2>i'm having to get to a flight 60 miles away today, and she was my last resort</e2>. i'm autistic (got an updated, adult dx today for the first time in 20 years), and <e3>i have extreme driving anxiety</e3>, so <e4>i've never had a dl or car</e4>.i worked about 120 miles away from home today (commuted with coworkers), and i tried my best to coordinate a shuttle to the airport after getting home, but i banked on getting a ride from a co-worker there instead (airport was on the way home). however... <e5>i forgot my meds at home this morning for a four day trip</e5>. ???? <e6>so naturally i had to back track</e6>. with no other way of getting to the airport, i reached out to my mom, apologizing profusely (which she hates, but i can't help it bc it's reflexive).i'm going to my younger brother's wedding. i'm torn between being suicidal over my ineptitude with my mom or being suicidal over missing my brother's wedding, which is really just a day to celebrate everything he has that i don't. ?any help here?"

"can someone help me? how do i find a job i like?depression/anhedonia aside, which i did try to get as much help for as i could, i just don't seem to like anything.at best people say ""do what you like! what are your interests?"". and that's a good point. but i don't have any interests other than rotting while browsing reddit/youtube/netflix. and maybe video games but not really anymore. and i don't want to work on anything related to these ""interests"".i'd love to work, if only i had a job i somewhat enjoyed. i don't need to be ecstatic 24/7 about it, i'm not an idiot, jobs suck and it won't always be enjoyable, no way around that. but i want to at least feel a sense of enjoyment from it, at least so i won't be miserable.but so far i've probably looked at hundreds of professions and jobs. literally went down lists of jobs on google/wikipedia and many other places. and not one appealed to me! not one!"

i took my lexapro at 10:00 pm and then took my trazodone for sleep at 2:20ish and right after i took it i thought to myself oh shit didnt i already take this?. so <e1>now im freaking out</e1> because <e2>i dont know if i double dosed on my trazodone</e2>. and i am very afraid of getting of getting serotonin syndrome. what should i do?????? im getting sleepy but dont wanna fall asleep in case anything feels wrong with my body.

"so as the title says, it's getting bad again. <e1>i first started having sypmtoms of depression around november</e1> because of <e2>my eating disorder</e2>. with treatment, my mood improved a lot and i felt surprisingly good, and my treatment team even noticed i was doing a lot better! but now i feel it coming back. i think it was triggered bc of my attachment issues. one of my treatment providers is going to be gone until the end of june, and i was going to have one last appointment before she leaves, and it happens to fall during my finals week. i usually see her every 3 weeks, not every 6 weeks. but my parents said i don't have an hour to spare during my ""busy"" finals week. i only have 3 finals to study for. idk how i'm going to cope. <e3>i'll probably talk to my therapist about this</e3> since <e4>it's really fucking things up for me</e4>. i don't need a depressive episode during finals/ap exams. i'm just worried my family can hear me during telehealth therapy and this is a somewhat embarrassing issue. idk why i react so strongly to someone leaving temporarily. i just feel depressed, and sad, and angry at my parents. anybody have advice?"

"i am so confused. no matter how hard i try to cut off from some pretty toxic, mean people, it's always me, who think that they will want to talk to me at some point. and i always end up forgiving and forgetting everything awful that they've done to me... i don't know, if i'm just depressed, desperate, lonely or all of that. in my head, <e1>i think that i should always try to understand and forgive everything</e1>, because <e2>i will need them more, than they need me</e2>. <e3>or that all those things weren't ""that bad""</e3>, so <e4>it's better to get hurt again and shake it off in some time, than to risking being left completly alone</e4> (even tho it would've been better for me).  maybe i'm just trying to make it seem, like i am a strong mf, who don't give a shit, and one day, it's going to pay off somehow, but i don't know. same with some members of my familly. even tho i may hate some of them, subconsciously i'm always trying to fit in and it's so hard to cut off, even tho i'm already on my own. i always hope, that one day bad people gonna realize, that they were wrong all this time, and i will prove them all wrong (even tho, they probably won't) and they will apologise to me (i know it's delusional and selfish to think that way) what do i do? how to be happy only with myself? sorry for my english."

"im curious how common it actually is for things to get better for someone whos in a depression. like, unless you kill yourself, which sadly people do do, but i never would, what is the actual probability you get past this. does it actually happen or is this just things people say to encourage and decrease suicide? what are the odds i dont ever get better? im trying everything. im fighting with every ounce of strength in my body. when will it pay off? or will it even? id like to hear from someone whos gotten past their depression after a long, hopeless battle."

"does anyone else have this problem where they think too much about time? i've recently started to pinpoint more reasons why i constantly feel bogged down by life and depressed even when i have nothing to be depressed about, and probably my number one issue is that every waking moment time is in my head.i wake up, and look at the time, thinking about how i have 5 minutes before i need to get out of bed and start working. i start working and then think ""well i have 3  hours to struggle through till i get my next 15 minute break"" then the moment that break shows up i think ""great now i only have 15 minutes till i need to go back to work"" and that occurs all day for those 8 hours until i get off and then i immediately think, ""well now i have 5 hours before i need to go to bed, and i have an hour i've dedicated to eating and other important things i need done, so really i only have 4 hours before bed, then the whole things starts again for 5 days.then even on weekends i wake up on a saturday and think, man i only have 2 days before work again, and i am constantly watching the clock, watching ever minute, every hour, and sunday is even worse. does anyone else have this problem too? and if you do or have overcome this problem what is/was your way of overcoming it?"

"6 days ago i broke up with my gf, but for the past month it was like we weren't a couple. she was gone, and i didn't accepted it. plus she tried to fake her love for me for like 3 week, and this broke completely my heart. now i'm here, after 3 week of pure pain, without an emotion. i fell like an empty shell. i don't have nothing to give to anyone. i don't fell nothing, only pain and sadness for like 10-15 seconds before i return in my aphaty. this isn't the first time i broke up, but this time, after all the unconditional love that i gave to her, i fell i don't have any emotions left. i fell drained from everything that i had inside. i don't know what to do. <e1>i don't want to commit suicide</e1> because <e2>it will cause pain to the ones who loves me</e2>. i really don't know what to do."

"how the fuck am i supposed to get and keep a job when i feel like this every day. <e1>have been depressed for years now</e1>, max i can keep a job for a couple of months then i just end up messing up. <e2>it's not just the work</e2>, or <e3>the fact i can barely get out of bed on time without looking and coming across like a zombie</e3>, but <e4>the fact i have lost all people skills and no job ever just let's you go in and get on with the job without having to talk to people i couldn't care less about talking too</e4>. i want to work, i need to work, but absolutely everywhere makes it impossible."

"well, i was feelling a little bad, clearly not my lowest moment, but, i wanted to do it, just end with this, i wasnt even very sad, also i wasbored and tired. then, i picked the belt and hang myself from the ceiling. before throwing me to the void, i just put on my headphones and put videotape. i didnt want to do it, i just wanted to remember how it feels, and i was doing it just to feel something. but, suddenly i didnt care and i just jumped. after these, i only have blurry memories of what happened. next, i was laying on the floor, with a small pain in my elbows and my head. the only things i remember is the sound of my cellphone hitting the flor, the song ending and my head being hitted with the wall. i didnt feel pain in my pain, i just felt the hit, but not pain. <e1>i had a blurry sight, i hadnt enough balance to stand up</e1>, so <e2>i was in that position for over 3 minutes</e2>. during this time i was thinking on how it happened, apparently the belt just untied, idk how, it was impossible to happen. this wasnt my first time, but it was the time i wnet more far. i wasnt even very bad. after all, i wasnt anxious or something. i was and i am totally calm. nothing changed on me like the past attempts. i really dont care if i would die there. and, i am affraid of the fact that i dont feel anything. maybe i will try it tomorrow."

sorry about this- im really socially awkward and just wanted to say some stuff. ive been saying i want to go home all the time. especially when im already at home. ive lived in this house most of my life but i still keep saying i want to go home. i dont really know where that would be but i want it so badly.people in my life keep saying that i need to do my work. one time i asked why and they said so you can be successful in your career and have a good life. ive been thinking life was too hard since 5th grade. if i cant handle that how am i supposed to be an adult. i also just dont want to. it seems like so much pain for no reason. wasted energy and time. if thats all there is to life then i really just dont want it.im so sick of all this bullshit. i wish that i could just die and be reborn as someone i care about in my next life.if you made it though my weird rambling thank you. i dont really know why but i feel a little better knowing someone will read this. ??

"<e1>im no longer enjoying playing video games</e1> (among other things i used to enjoy) because <e2>i dont have to think too hard when i do them and my mind starts to wander</e2>. because of <e3>this empty space in my mind</e3>, <e4>depressive thoughts and feelings of sadness, anxiety, and guilt begin setting in</e4>. the only time im mostly free from my thoughts and internal emotions is when im with friends. but even then, i cant completely suppress them. i begin thinking things along the lines of theyd rather be doing a multitude of other things than be with me, or theyre friends or significant others with people who dont like me, which means the fervor from those people will rub off on them when they find out im hanging out with their friends. i know its somewhat irrational, but i cant kick it out of my head. society tells me to do what i enjoy to purge these thoughts, but when i do what i enjoy, the thoughts just come back; i cant escape them."

"i dont know if this is the right sub reddit for this problem, but <e1>it does make me feel depressed</e1> so... <e2>irl friends are just a burden or a problem to me</e2>, i dont think my male friend likes me, only likes me when i play games with him when he asks me to anyways. friends online are just better, they cant judge you on your appearance, and if you dont like each other you can just block. i hate my relationships with my friends, like i love them, yet i hate them. its a nightmare to try to sleep and think about my problems with friends. i think the only real friend is my dad, hes a true bro, yknow?"

"recently, a coworker [21f] of mine [23m] started ignoring/avoiding me out of the blue, even though she is very friendly and talkative with other coworkers. the fact that we were vibing really well, shared alot in common, and even connected emotionally makes this even stranger for me. i was told that i should just avoid her for the time being and hope that she will come back, but after a couple weeks of this cold war <e1>i am starting to feel very depressed</e1> <e2>thinking that the day may never come</e2>. i also feel like trying to talk to her now will piss her off even more if she's not ready to talk.what can/should i do for myself?"

"my life seems amazing but its not.<e1>im sad</e1> <e2>my dads tells me im not good enough</e2>.im useless im a awful daughter, he yells and cussed me out. <e3>and i cant take it anymore</e3>. <e4>he ruined volleyball for me he took me out of the team i worked so hard for</e4>.<e5>he is hateful he tells me i have no friends because of my personality and im selfish</e5>.i know hes right i cut and i have a scare and i hate it i dont want to die.but i dont want to live.i just want it to end.i hate being numb to protect myself from my dads evil comments.i want to feel things i dont know if ill live past tomorrow.thanks"

"i was diagnosed with clinical depression earlier this year. i talked to a therapist, i was on meds for a few weeks but i kinda gave up. i'd have random ""negativity spirals"" where i'd either have absolutely no energy and feel ""numb"" or i'd be hypersensitive where i'd lose my temper easily and would be annoyed by almost everything. at some point i gave up. i stopped trying to get help, i'd cut my wrists, i'd put cigarettes out on myself and i just waited for everything to overwhelm me until i reach my limit. i've always contemplated suicide everyday since last year but i'm scared to attempt suicide, i would get frustrated and start hurting myself again. <e1>i live in a very christian community</e1>, so even <e2>when i spend hours explaining to my closest friends about how i'm feeling all they'd tell me to do would be to ""read the bible"" and to ""pray""</e2>. right now i'm at a point where i can't even process positive things. i know my friends are there and that they love and support me. i know there are others who are having it worse than me (because i've been told way too many times). but none of this makes me happy. i don't know how long i'd be able to push on. i don't know if i should even try to push on. i don't know what to do anymore."

"been dealing with a lot of mental health stuff this past 3 years. i just got out a toxic relationship 6 months ago. he emotionally abused me, accused me of things i didnt do, recorded all my messages and calls, threatened to post my nudes, took recordings of me on facetime without my consent... i could go on and on and on theres so much more trauma ive taken from the relationship. he once told me if i didnt admit to things i didnt do, he would send me nudes to my dad. even after all of this i just cant get him out of my head. i miss him everyday. ive never had anybody connect to me like he did. i love him still. why? he is a terrible person? why do i want him so bad? <e1>i cant talk to anybody about how i feel</e1> because <e2>i feel like people will look at me like an idiot</e2>. not to mention i have no friends at all! <e3>nobody to talk to</e3>. so <e4>i just sit in my sadness at night</e4>. that pit in my stomach just never goes away."

"she'll never see this, but i can't believe my dumbass thought, even for a second, that i had a chance. when she laid her head down on my chest and snuggled up on me in front of a bunch of other people at a party last week, i legit though that maybe, just maybe, she was interested. maybe she could be the peace i've been searching so long for. but hey, at least for that hour holding her close, i felt happy for the first time in a very long time. so thank you for that hanna. thank you for the briefest of reprieve from the darkness. don't know why i got my hopes up. i should have known better."

"i've been jobless for some time and it really effected my mood. felt like no one would pick me over others. this past wednesday i finally got an interview and got a job. <e1>i was excited</e1> because <e2>i felt like maybe i can change and not feel like an embarrassment with my parents</e2>.next day, and everything falls apart. supposed to start friday, but they send me thursday to cash a check so i can buy supplies to work at home (laptop, monitor, cables etc). i didn't think anything was wrong, but <e3>the bank refused to put it in my account</e3> because <e4>they thought it was a scam</e4>. i didn't want to believe it, but when i explained they pushed me to pay a partial amount and i would be reimbursed.<e5>i tried to get them to buy it and send it over</e5> because <e6>i felt safer that way</e6>, but they insisted so it would be under my name and i could keep everything. i understand it would be free, but i don't got space for all that anyway, nor would i use them. <e7>the person stopped replying</e7>, but <e8>i think it because her day would've ended</e8>.hopefully i am wrong, and this is a real job. but i feel like i fucked up big time. i gave away information, but luckily saved money. tomorrow will tell, but depression makes any problem go kaioken100"

"hi, i'm 13. i've struggled with depression and anxiety for years now. according to my dad i've been depressed since i started third grade so about 5 years. when i moved away for a year it got really bad. i'm now in seventh grade, on lexapro, and doing okay. recently, i've been realizing i have a few things that don't fit in with depression. i get points of time where i get really hyper and will go into cleaning mode (or get really dedicated to something else for a few hours). sometimes it's almost like i just can't stop acting crazy or weird. i'm also terrible at following instruction or catching mistakes in my math. i make a lot of careless mistakes that i didn't used to make like thinking multiplication was addition. i'm just bad at remembering things i should remember half the time. <e1>i also fidget a lot, mainly with leg tapping</e1>, but <e2>i believe this is from my anxiety</e2>a. i honestly just don't know anymore. it's too confusing for me to understand half the time..."

im 5 weeks postpartum. i was super happy until a week ago. now i have intrusive thoughts about harming myself and the baby. i finally got a counselor to speak to me. <e1>she says im in crisis</e1> so <e2>she was able to squeeze me in</e2>. thank god most told me 3 weeks before they could speak to me. im so scared. i told her i didnt know if i was lying to myself about feeling safe to avoid being taken away from the baby and admitted. im waiting to hear from the psychiatrist to start medications. idk if ill make it. 2 plus weeks to feel better. i just dont know. ive always had depression but this postpartum bullshit has taken it up 1000 levels. im at a loss.

"i've been alone in my room for 16 months and i've become a shadow of the person i used to be, and should be. <e1>i'm about to flunk university</e1> because <e2>i haven't done a single piece of work, read a book or watched a lecture in months</e2>. my room is a mess, littered with clothes, empty bottles and dirty dishes. i haven't showered in 5 days. i barely eat. literally all i do is wake up, browse reddit or youtube, sleep again, wake up, repeat. i can't even bring myself to watch a movie or play a video game, i think about sitting through it and i'm just like ""nah"". i don't even think anymore. i just exist and sleep. i avoid talking to anybody, with a backlog of ignored messages and emails.i really don't think i can ever recover from this. i'm 27 years old and not getting any younger. i really don't know what the answer is...i'm on meds but if anything they're making me worse.i don't want to die, but fuck life."

"this is the first time i've written this here. but <e1>my emotional state is so flimsy</e1> <e2>anything can set me off, even if i don't know what that thing is</e2>. today i went to work. i did pretty well. they made waffles and i had a nice cup of coffee. i talked to a few colleagues, had a couple laughs and <e3>one of my closest friends started working there</e3> so <e4>i had good company</e4>. finished my job, tallied my numbers and i did pretty well. came home and for some reason <e5>i just felt empty</e5>. <e6>i went to my kitchen and pulled out a knife. i put it against my wrist and was just thinking how just one move and it would all be over. it would be slow, painful and dramatic, but it would be over</e6>. i spent the next half hour just crying like a mad man before i decided to write it here. i've known i was depressed for a long time and it's not the first time i've been suicidal. every time i've made up my mind to just end it all, something stopped me. last time was over a year ago and it was a dog that just came barking and let me pet him. but this time there was no one. i was alone in the house. it was such a good day yet why does it feel so bad?"

"according to my wife, i lost who i was after the pandemic started. i guess it makes sense. as an extrovert, not being able to connect with others in person was hell. add to that starting a new career without any coworker interaction, and i was a sitting duck. my wife told me today that i seem to have no identity outside of her. and then it hit me that i can't even remember what i was like or what i liked to do before the pandemic.but i remembered a few things today. i remembered that i like to listen to my music really loud. i like to drive fast with the windows down. and <e1>i like to dance</e1>. so <e2>i drove home from work today, windows down and music blaring</e2>. and then i put my headphones in and mopped the kitchen while i twerked and danced my ass off.i've gotta get better. i have no other option."

"i finally got a job, and now my anxiety is off the charts. <e1>its making me super depressed and its stressing me out so much</e1> because <e2>i just feel sick to my stomach with anxiety and i dont know what to do</e2>. its not even a hard job. i work a register. its an easy first job. but ive worked two days and i desperately want to quit and just sleep for a week. im so wound up with anxiety i feel like im gonna vomit and im just so scared and i dont know why. its thrown me into one hell of a depression loop and im trying to fight out of it before my next shift tomorrow.i just want to be normal. to go into my job, not be literally shaking if something goes mildly wrong, and to do my job and leave and not be terrified of going back in. i hope this stops soon. i cant handle this. im so useless as a human being."
you know when you dont feel sad you just feel heavy. you are too tired to process the pain and can barely find motivation to move

"last night, i was sitting on my building's porch after a breakdown. getting out of that apartment usually helps, but i'm slipping and starting to lean on substance abuse again. one of my neighbors came down for a smoke. i didn't tell him why i was down there. after a bit of talking, he suddenly opened up about his father's suicide a few years back. about how he had never gotten help and how he wish he knew. hes never said anything like that before. i think i've maybe met him once. and considering i was finishing up my fourth breakdown of the week, i'm taking it as a sign to finally address my suicidal thoughts and seek professional help. i just sorted out my insurance to see my options (turned out my college provides free counseling through student health), and i have my first appointment scheduled. i know no therapy or drug will magically poof my pain away, but i'm hoping the universe was giving me a push in the right direction last night. posting this in case someone else needs a sign today too."

"these last few days have actually been okay, but the scary part is knowing that it wont last long. <e1>im so terrified of being happy</e1> because <e2>i know its just a matter of time before i have the intruding thoughts and episodes coming back</e2>. i know ill never be 100% okay. i know ill be on meds for the rest of my life. ill never be fixed. <e3>its one of those things where i have to take it one day at a time</e3> because <e4>ill never know what mood ill wake up in</e4>."
"i felt numb all day and now i'm suddenly spewdwalking to class excited to talk to my friend. i'm, like, smiling to myself like an idiot too? how can a depressed person do this? am i not depressed,"

"where i live; lockdown was reimposed due to the raise in cases, which means there are restrictions to the amount of people you're allowed to meet and you can dine-in anywhere. i used to love going out by myself to cafes and just hanging out by myself, it honestly brought me so much peace and joy to just enjoy my own company, away from my toxic household. with the current lockdown measures, i can no longer do that, and have been forced to spend alot of time at home, which is making my mind spiral. i really feel like i just want to end it all, but at the same time i don't want to. i don't know who i can talk to, i do not want to feel like a burden by talking to my friends about it. <e1>i feel like the more i text my friends and reach out</e1> because <e2>i'm feeling so fucking lonely</e2>, they would eventually just get annoyed at me and leave me. i have resulted to isolating myself and trying to figure out why i'm feeling the way i'm feeling, but i think it's just making things worse, but i'm still afraid reach out to my friends in fear of annoying them, although i know they'll be there for me and have been there for me in the past. why do i feel like i can go through everything alone? i just want someone to listen to me."

"hello, i am currently suffering from chronic depression, <e1>been to the psychiatric hospital twice</e1> for <e2>attempting suicide</e2>, been prescribed mirtazapine and quetiapine and ever since i've felt really braindead, started drinking more to feel some sort of emotion, i am honestly curious if i am doomed forever, abusing my meds and drinking. doesn't feel like the life i really want to live, been a suffering ever since i was 14, now i am 20."

"i am a man, but my index and pointer fingers are almost the same length in my right hand which correlates to a more feminine brain.i've always been much more empathetic and cautious since i was little. i know and feel like a man and i don't struggle with gender dysphoria in the slightest. i think this gives me a lower visio-spacial iq and less music ability. i appreciate art and engineering and put them of high value, but those who are really good have much longer ring fingers. i just don't think i will measure up in anything i ever do.my dreams feel so crushed and i don't know how to move forward. i already have a non-existent self-esteem weighing down on me and now this. <e1>i don't know what i'm going to do</e1>. <e2>i'm so down</e2>."

"<e1>until covid i worked in retail/restaurants my whole life</e1> as <e2>i am extremely personable, albeit an introvert</e2>. now with covid, i very much so do not trust americans wholeheartedly, im getting the vaccine but everything is opening up at 100% no restrictions near me, which just makes no sense to me. poor behavior amongst people these days, retail workers are the frontline of managing covid and policies these days, for little pay. <e3>now i dont even want these jobs</e3> as <e4>ive not been social for over a year now</e4>.<e5>i did not go to college</e5> as <e6>i have learning disabilities</e6>. <e7>i also have awful fine motor skills</e7>, <e8>likely due to growing up anxious a lot due to alcohol in the house</e8>. father has never been abusive physically or frankly intentionally abusive, <e9>theyve never processed any emotions</e9> so ,<e10>theyre a mess</e10>. still live with them and constantly triggered by it.i also am sorta addicted to weed, <e11>as i believe i have ptsd at this point</e11> so <e12>i truly feel its a need not a want at this point which is frustrating</e12>.i could go on and on lol, so, help? im truly getting to the point it feels things just aint gonna work out for me, whole life has been out of my control. i was adopted, controlled by helicopter and anxious parents, now my anxiety runs my life, nothing is in my control or works out for me it seems.anyways, thanks in advance for your responses, have a good day all!"
because <e1>when i'm going to be sad again</e1> <e2>it's going to be so painful</e2>.
<e1>nobody in my group does anything solo with me</e1> because <e2>im so depressed and sapped when we do</e2>. how do i get that online gamer energy back again?

"i really do not know if a career that causes me a lot of anxiety, fear, sadness, and uncertainty is in the end net negative or net positive for me, and i'm not sure i have the perspective to tell. on the one hand, <e1>i have a lot of anxiety about what will happen to my job</e1>, and <e2>it weighs on my enjoyment of it and (somewhat, though not in any way that ends up getting noticed by anyone but me) my performance in it</e2>. <e3>i am uncomfortable in my own skin</e3>, <e4>partly due to negative associations with the job</e4> and <e5>partly due to who i feel like i have to be to others in the workplace</e5>. on the other hand, i am quite successful at it overall, and have now invested a little more than twenty years of my life into it. <e6>while i do well, i'm not positioned to retire, and too young to do so anyway</e6> - <e7>so i'd be trading the crushing anxiety of what i do now for the uncertainty of figuring out how to do something else</e7>. but more days than it used to that looks like maybe a way out of the feeling of trapped-ness. i guess i don't know how to make this sort of decision - so have been paralyzed in not making it. anyway, this is the first time i've ever posted here. <e8>the contents of this post would surprise those closest to me, but i still feel like i need to think about it</e8> - because <e9>i don't think i can feel like this for the next twenty years</e9>."

"im suffering with anxiety and depression for 7 months, im taking escitalopram 10mg, and <e1>i have trouble with sleep</e1>, <e2>so my doc prescribed me ambien for sleep</e2> and after that i read that ambien shouldnt take together with antidepressants and have side effect like:dementia, nightmare vivid, sleep walking, <e3>it can worsen anxiety and depression</e3>, <e4>so after that i feel too anxious to take this medicines, can someone help me with any other medicines or any advice on how to sleep</e4>?! thank you all."

"man i cant get started im 15 and i havent been able to pass a class since 6th grade,im obese,all my friends think im annoying,i have family problems and i cant escape any of it i have no motivation to do anything and if i do its slim to none. all i can do to feel better is play video games which i suck at or watch sports where i cant do any wrong and i spend most of my time alone in my room in silence and just sit there i cant find anything to keep me happy anymore i have suicidal thoughts as well"

"my insecurities and self destructive behavior have really hurt my relationship of almost 3 years, and im willing to do anything to change myself for the better. i have trouble calming myself down which usually causes me to break down in tears and make rash decisions. i end up isolating myself from friends and my partner, which im turn hurts them more then anything. i want to be better and i dont know where to start. im willing to talk to anyone whos willing to listen to my situation. im just really desperate for help."

"i (20f) have had depression since middle school. i have some really amazing friends, best friends even, but at the end of each day i feel suffocated by loneliness. i am convinced that i was put on this earth to be completely and utterly alone. i have considered the great alternative far too many times and it has become a daily thought. i have to much love to give and it just rots within me. i dont want to be miserable anymore but the daily deafening loneliness is far too much to bear. everybody has somebody it seems although i know thats not true. i can only continue to dream of someone to share with. how can i encourage myself to stick around?"

"i hate that it's graduation time for so many people, <e1>i hate it</e1> because <e2>i wish it was me walking across the stage, or me pursuing something i love and want to do instead of working retail</e2>. i wish i had the energy or drive to do what they did, but i can barely hobble out of bed to go to work everydayi hate my bf for getting a good job doing the thing he loves and went to school for. i'm so proud of him, and <e3>i hate myself</e3> for <e4>the fact that it somehow hurts me</e4>. his sibling got a accepted into the school they wanted, im proud of them but <e5>my heart feels heavy</e5> because...<e6>i wish it was mei keep looking back at my life</e6> and going ""what could i have done to be like them"" and telling myself that it's not too late but realistically i'm probably never gonna feel achieved and content with myself. i've reached the point of hating people for their success and happiness, and i don't want thati feel like the people who had so much hope for me growing up has turned their back on me and looked elsewhere, and i think it's my fault. i've discovered i can drink it down and cry about it it my bed but idk how long that's gonna last"

"ive struggled with depression for most of my life. but honestly, its at the worst its ever been right now. i moved home to a family that hates who ive become in the past year. moved away from all of my friends who made me feel like i mattered for the first time. my mind is in a constantly dark place. im tired of fighting. the terrible trio as i call it (adhd, anxiety, depression) as been beating me senseless. nothing makes me happy anymore. i sleep so much some days and other days not at all. i just want to be alone and isolate myself and my family calls it selfish when i do that or when i go out with the few friends i have here. when in reality my family makes the depression worse sometimes. the constant nit picking, putting my down, and making me feel like my mental illnesses are just an excuse for me to be lazy. but im trying. <e1>i go out with my friends sometimes</e1> because <e2>when im with them the nasty negative voice in my head gets a little quieter</e2>. i try to get out of bed and do something to make the world better. but im so tired. so tired of fighting, of trying, of failing and a falling short in everyones eyes. i wont give up. i promised to many people id stay, but its so hard. i just need someone to understand what its like and that im trying my best."

like it says just found the messages between her and this guy after everything i go through and open up to her she does this to me just fucking had enough of every person. im in so many states of minds and most likely will self harm and of course thinking about worse
"i am empty inside. literally nothing. enough is happening in my life right now and i at least should have some emotion about it, but its just a void."

"god i dont even remember what it feels like to be hugged by someone like a genuine hug. i would do anything just to hear my parents say they are proud of me or that they love me. i think ive only ever hugged my brothers once and honestly i really wish i could just run into their rooms and hug them and tell them how much they mean to me. <e1>and the thought of even being in a relationship makes me cry</e1> because <e2>i know it will never happen how could someone ever love such an ugly freak like me</e2>, im literally going to be alone forever what is the point in staying alive."

"i don't know what to do. i feel miserable in my marriage, like i do not belong here. i really miss my family too and want to be by myself again. i feel this marriage is worsening my anxiety and i have developed hand tremors, shortness of breath and pain in my neck and head whenever i'm anxious. maybe i'll swallow another five acetaminophen in the next hour so that will make 5000mg in less than 24 hours. but i also want to live to see my family."

"i'm depressed just want someone to talk to, to be there like i'm there for everyone else i text them right after a get the notification then i'm alone again i wish i wasn't lonely i had someone idk what to do"

"i'm in a better place now, but i still feel so deeply depressed and suffer from extreme fatigue. i've been checked by multiple doctors and they say it's just my depression. i exercise every day, eat well, make new friends, but i still feel empty. my body is so heavy that i can barely sit up straight. i just want to sleep forever"

"to get out of depression you have to fight for yourself. to consistently do that however, you have to believe that you are worth fighting for. without that mindset your attempts at positive & healthy behaviors won't stick.there is a very simple trick that i have found, to connect to your inner self of self worth however.go somewhere quiet, you can be sitting down or standing up whatever. next try to make yourself laugh, have some dumb (harmless) fun if that's what it takes.then explore your opinion on something that is important to you. think about it from different angles and perspectives.doing these simple things, helps you remember that you are an fun, interesting person, who's thoughts and opinions matter.it reminds you of the fact that you are the only person in your life, that you ever truly need. everyone & everything else comes and goes."

"why do i feel the way i do. im still young, i havent had to struggle for much in life, but yet everyday still feels like a struggle. it makes me worried for when im older and actually have real social, family or financial responsibilities and stresses. i have friends and a girlfriend and a family that cares about me. but still i have days when i feel really low and depressed. does anyone know why this happens? will it get worse with time? how can i get better?"

it is saturday night and i am laying in bed with the lights off. i can hear people outside having a good time and <e1>it just makes me sad</e1> that <e2>i will never experience that</e2>. i dont know why im still here when i dont do anything except complain about how much life sucks.

"im curious to see how people cope, and what has helped most in hard times. for me, its been my chickens. even though they are my school project (agriscience high school), i talk to them and play with them for hours each day. my mood is so much better, and i just really enjoy watching them run around and live."

"i have been working hard with my local mental health team getting on medication and countless hours of therapy starting in 2018, i've curbed my binge eating almost completely. (144.7kg down to 108.9kg) and have stopped recreational drugs and alcohol entirely.despite these positives i've been in a pretty serious tail spin coming to a head with my mum finding a suicide note, and outing my suicidal thoughts to my extended family in our group chat. i've missed over 20 calls and the aftermath of this is ongoing and it's been real overwhelming for me.i dont feel like my meds are working and despite me getting a better handle on my panic attacks and anxiety <e1>i'm still so depressed</e1> and <e2>it's been real tough</e2>. i just am so tired of having to fight this hard for this long and theres still no end in sight. i'm jobless and feeling like such a burden to all those around me, both financially and in general.the good news though, if there is any is that i've decided to come completely clean with my psychologist on monday  and explain that the suicidal thoughts are every day now. i'm hoping that he can help me because i'm at the end of the line."

"i somewhat pissed off my best friend and the love of my life on sunday, and he has not spoken to me since.  what occurred was that i was sad that he wasnt able to talk on the phone.  <e1>i had a rough weekend</e1> so <e2>i really wanted to talk on the phone with him</e2>.  after he said he wasnt available, i was being sarcastic.  he didnt take the hint :(.  he has not spoken to me since.  even after i told him i was being sarcastic, he hasnt opened the texting app we used.  every day gets worse and worse without him.  my soulmate is gone.  hopefully hell change his mind, but i doubt that.  i hate ending things on bad terms and without clarity.  it just breaks my heart for how much i miss him.  i just want to tell him im sorry.  i feel trapped and feel that theres no solution.  if you know a good looking guy from texas that likes history, let him know that his best friend that likes history as well misses him :(is there any one out there for me to talk to? i really need it, thank you if you are able to help :)he would be the one that would help me when im depressed, but now im on my own ;("
i rather spend my time doing something else than scrolling on social media and seeing other people  actually enjoying life while i waste my days being depressed in my room

"so i will start by saying <e1>i do have some health issues, headaches and getting sick easily</e1> which <e2>hinder me from being productive and doing work that i should be doing</e2>. but on some days, like today, i just dont feel like doing anything or working. <e3>i dont wanna play games</e3> because then <e4>it feels like im wasting my time</e4>, but i also cant seem to get started on my work, and i do have piles of work and projects that need to be finished. everytime i look up depression symptoms, i dont feel hopeless or sad 24/7, but i find it so hard to start working or be more productive. <e5>i woke up at 2pm today</e5> because <e6>i felt sick last night, took 3 advils today and now im already thinking of taking a nap instead of trying to finish my work</e6>. anyone else feel like this?"

"i was at a shopping centre earlier observing people and it made me feel disconnected from reality. everyone seemed so stressed and just focused on materialism or looking at their mobile phones like programmed robots. <e1>i hate going on my newsfeed to see people sharing photos of them out drinking and having a good time</e1> because <e2>it just seems so fake</e2>, if you are having a good time why do you need to share it? i dont feel like i can relate to anyone, my friends act the same they just want to go out drinking, take selfies and repeat until next weekend. everyone just seems so soulless like there is no purpose anymore. i feel so isolated surrounded by lifeless people that only seem to think and talk about themselves."

"man i dont wanna make this long. i feel empty, my sadness turned into anger, and anger into just the dissipation of my character. i know i probably wont be happy for a while, and thing is i dont have the urge to end it, i just wanna leave and i want people to forget me, who knows if people will really be sad if im gone. love you all."

"does anyone  else have a hard time focusing/recalling things. this is one of the reasons that <e1>i can barely talk to even my parents</e1>, because <e2>they remember so much better than me</e2>. i feel ashamed of this all the time, hoping that someone does not ask me something i don't remember.my ability to retain information started when in high school and has gotten even worse. to anyone who reads this thank you, to anyone who comments thank you, and i wish healing and peace."

"my mood is so unstable, i can go from feeling okay to complete shit in matter of seconds for the dumbest reasons. or for no reason. rn <e1>i'm tired and can't go sleep</e1> because <e2>reasons</e2> and i'm just so sad and empty amd overwhelmed by the bad feelings. i have no idea how to cope, this has been going on for ages and i don't remember the last time i actually felt good for more than a few minutes. i can't get therapy (i'm 16 and my parents don't really take me seriously nor we really have the money for online counselling), i guess i'm looking for an advice, but also to vent"

"i was born into a troubled family, parents having sever verbal and physical fights, i was sexually abused at the age of 5 by a close family member, my mom realised and it stopped, my first year teacher warned my mom that <e1>i had depression</e1>, due to <e2>the stigma around it</e2> mom never sought help or believed that, she used to say that hes just a quiet and nice boy, i became a super bully and aggressive person at school, but the nicest person at home, ended up marrying my first girlfriend, migrated to another country, studied computer science and got a phd in it, all the aggression was gone, fast forward alto 35 years of age, walked into my home finding my wife with another man. the definition of me was shattered, depression got severe, became suicidal, didnt want to lose her, thought its best if we stayed together, managed to save the marriage, have a one year old son now, but, now that im mentally stronger, ive realised that i dont want to live with her, but <e3>we have a child now</e3>. so <e4>i cant just walk away</e4>, and the depression is creeping its way back again. i dont have anyone to talk to them about these things. so just sharing with you guys and taking these words off of my chest hoping it can make me feel better."

"sorry for my bad englisch im not a nativ.for many pepole i actually have the perfect life, i have a girlfriend, a good job and i have achieved a lot. but i dont have a lot of friends, actually one friend. but he life his own life, in the past time we dont do so much together. he has his own friends, and me. i dont know, i feel somtimes lonely, and it hurt so much. i search for new friends, but i dosent work. my life is really bad, im every day sad and life sucks.. i dont know what to do, im really tiert of all the pain that i dont have a really friend with i can talk to..it hurts so much"

"i have friends, i have pretty good grades,  but im still so sad. i mean sure i have friends but no one really looks forward to me being there, i don't have a person that i look forward to or can actually talk to. maintaining good grades is just messing me up even more and i can't find motivation to do anything, but then again i ahve no friends to talk to. <e1>i don't want to say i'm depressed</e1> because <e2>it doesn't seem right</e2> because <e3>there are so many people worse off than me</e3>. i just don't even know what to do. the things i looked forward to don't even excite me anymore i feel like the the world would move the same without me."

"so ive been feeling very suicidal today, its been a struggle. wrote out some letters for people. found an old fortune cookie form a take out the other day, i opened it and it said always begin with an end in mind it was so fitting it actually made me smile haha"

"i (19f) have only been trying to find an antidepressant that works for me since october 2020. i have moderate to severe depression, with suicidal thoughts daily for the past 2+ years. i thought reaching out and finally seeking medical help (along with my ongoing psychotherapy) would be a huge step. it felt huge at first, but now im so exhausted. ive tried upwards of 5 medications already? varying dosages? and such varying side effects. none have worked me long term. i know the search can be a long process, i know some people find it after years. but i just dont know how to hold out until then. i feel more hopeless now if anything, like even with all the resources im not okay. im just tired of the repetitive process that seems to go nowhere (ive also heard that sometimes no medication works for certain people, so what if this process is futile? its exhausting either way)."

"today, i had lunch with my best friend that i hadn't seen in several months. i was glad to spend time with her but on the way home, i just cried. i have never been a happy all the time person but <e1>july will mark 3 years that my son was killed</e1> so <e2>my depression has skyrocketed</e2>. yes, i am on antidepressants and was in therapy for 2 yrs. there is just nothing, only an emptiness. i have a wonderful,  fulfilling job but often get hate for it (cps social worker). i just want to feel happiness again even if it is just for a few minutes."

"please dont be scared to ask for / get help, i wont lie to you and say its gonna be easy but it will be worth itjust know youve taken a massive step by saying you think you are ready to get help.even if its starting off small by reaching out to someone even if its family, a friend  or colleague where you work, we all have to start somewherea lot of the services offered are confidential so if you feel that you dont want your family to know then steps can be taken to ensure thatthe road to recovery wont be a quick process, take each day as it comes you will have good days and bad days but <e1>you will get thereive only just recently reached out for help</e1> as <e2>things got to point where it was overwhelming me</e2> and and i had several breakdowns this week to the point where my physical health had suffered too and it put me in hospitali reached out to my boss who saw i was really struggling offered to help me get the help i needed .i was scared to but im glad i did reach out and ask for help before it was to late and <e3>before i did something stupid</e3> as <e4>i was contemplating harming myselfits</e4> gonna be a massive journey that ill have to take each day as it comes  but im on the right path to get back on track"

"why is it that i know theres a perfect version of life out there for me and i just cant reach out and grab it? at least not yet... i hope ill eventually be able to clutch the pure happiness i dream of, but i dont feel anywhere close to that yet. its like im aware of this hope, and yet also know where im headed in the meanwhile. if i dont defeat depression ill never reach my potential. maybe ill die from suicide, or my heart will explode, or ill be an unlucky soul who goes before their time in a car crash or something.i can see both sides of the coin, the hope, the confidence of self, the overcoming- and then the flip side: death, a wasted life. its fucked that i can have this awareness and barely be able to put it into words sometimes, never mind trying to overcome it. it must take some insane inner strength to be able to overcome this illness and live fully. the only option is so much hard work. and depression often shields me from doing the hard work because im scared of it. im scared of facing my failures thus far. i dont want to squander this one life that i have, but depression is forcing my hand, and im afraid that i might."

"so there is this girl in my class. she always wears black and visibly looks ""depressed"". <e1>she also cuts and i know</e1> because <e2>i've seen cuts on her hands</e2>. the only thing i don't understand is why does she brag about it? a lot of times she tries to ""brag"" about having more cuts or getting a higher score on a depression test and to be honest, it's just very irritating and worrying. at this point, i don't know if she just wants attention or if she's really depressed. as someone who has depression, i try to hide it as much as i can. i hide it by making many friends, by playing a lot of sports and i'm known in my class for being the ""fun and happy guy"". i'm not sure, but i always imagine that people who are actually depressed would want to hide it. the only reason why <e3>i don't cut myself</e3> is that <e4>i'm pretty religious</e4>. i'm christian i believe that self-harm is a sin that can stop you from going to heaven. to be honest, if i didn't believe this i wouldn't be writing this post right now. i'm worried for her and just want to know if it's normal for someone who is depressed to be ""bragging"" about it. thanks."

"every day feels so long, i just want to break down and cry all the time but i don't. and i'm starting a new job in a couple of weeks and i just feel like i hate my life more and more everyday the closer it gets. it's not something i want to do for the rest of my life but honestly what the hell do i want? nothing. <e1>i feel so freaking lonely which is my own fault</e1> because <e2>i push everyone away and rely on others too much to make me happy</e2>. i just end up disappointed. <e3>i won't commit suicide</e3> because <e4>that is just way too scary</e4> but if i had the option to just stop existing i wouldn't be here anymore."

"i am a writer. i am writing a fantasy series in which i have spent 2 years planning the details and 1 year writing half of it. one of my characters is women of 21 years old and she is in depression, like last stages one, when suicidal thoughts come to her mind.<e1>i am not in depression</e1> hence <e2>it is very difficult for me to write from that perspective</e2>. <e3>it would be disrespectful if i wrote this character without understanding the mindset and thoughts of a person suffering from this illness</e3>.so, <e4>i need help from people on r/depression to tell me, how it feels to have depression</e4>. i just need your thoughts to delve into the mind of the character, and understand it, so that i can do justice to the illness, my character and my series.tl;dr- just need your thoughts on depression."
he makes me feel so worthless and horrible. i wish i was dead when hes angry with me. but when hes actually nice like 1/3 of the time i feel like my depression is gone.

"do you experience sudden mood shifts? are there many ups and downs in your relationships? do you find yourself engaging in impulsive behaviors (e.g., overeating, substance use, self- injury)?if so, researchers at the university of kentucky are inviting you to participate in a study on borderline personality disorder. eligible participants will be provided over 18 sessions of cognitive behavioral therapy at no cost. in addition to attending therapy sessions, research participation will involve completing a diagnostic interview to confirm eligibility, attending 2-3 follow up interviews, and completing online questionnaires. all study visits may take place in-person or via telehealth. participants will be compensated up to $75 for the completion of follow-up interviews.you may be eligible to participate if you:meet criteria for borderline personality disorder following a study assessmentare not using certain substances (i.e., opioids, methamphetamine)are 18 years or olderfor more information:tips research program: https://tips.as.uky.edu/participateuk clinic for emotional healthtipslab@uky.edu"

"i'm just venting here but for the past couple months now i've been living the same day. i feel like i'm giving so much effort to try to break out of this cycle that <e1>i'm in only to sink in it further</e1> because <e2>my boyfriend who is also very clinically depressed</e2>, continually points out how nothing changes.i feel like it's solely my responsibility to get us both out of this funk that were in ..i know that's not the case and it can't all rely on me. but it very much feels like it. people around me are failing to realize that i'm just as much in that hole as they are. i can't take it. i've been trying to cook homemade meals, stay on top of cleaning while going to work too but if i don't for a couple of days im told i'm lazy.i can't help but think what is the point. doesn't help much that i'm trying to get back into school... i feel like i have no support.  and that's just an awful, <e3>lonely feeling when you have a live in partner but he's just more of a roommate at this point</e3> because <e4>he's so stuck in his own head to notice my efforts</e4>. if you're depressed do your self a favor and fix yourself first."
